40027001	Niʼa mahala vulihia ʼinega toveguba qiduqiduadi wese ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo qabudi iluvine vonigo Ieisu ina luveʼaligia.
40027002	ʼInega Ieisu nimana iyoqonia itauyea me Loma edi gavana Failato ʼinaya nuanuadi ina keiea be liuna ina baia ta Ieisu naluvinei ʼaliga ʼinaya.
40027003	Tuta~nana Iudasa nuana ʼeqaʼuya vonigo Ieisu ina luveʼaligia, ʼinega nuagivila ta nuanuana siliba 30~dina nanei ʼeviviedi toveguba qiduqiduadi be ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo ʼidia,
40027004	ʼinega tauya ʼidia ta vonaya, “luveifana niʼa yaviaqia, mana ʼoloto aqiaqina yasuluvea ʼimia.” Ta ivona ʼeviviea, “Imaʼa ge taha ada nuanua baʼe yani~nana weaqina, ta ʼesi oʼa tauʼu eu luveifana weaqina una nuanua.”
40027005	ʼInega Iudasa siliba 30~dina feledi Vanue Gwalagwalana gamonaya, ta ʼifoqe tauya ʼinega taunega magana sikwea ʼabo ʼaliga.
40027006	Toveguba qiduqiduadi siliba~dina igwagwedi ivonaya, “Ge ana fata be baʼe siliba~dina kana aʼudi mane ana ʼebeluveaqe ʼinaya, mana luvine ʼenoʼeno vonaya vonigo mane luveʼaliga ʼinega ge ana fata be kana vefewei Vanue Gwalagwalana weaqina.”
40027007	Ta edi veqae ʼabibodanaya iluvine be mane~nana ʼinega taha toʼabi ʼulena ena bwaʼobwaʼo ina gimwanea, ta bwaʼobwaʼo~nana wagawaga adi debaʼunu weaqidi.
40027008	ʼInega bwaʼobwaʼo~nana igabea Sulala Bwaʼobwaʼona, ta wawa~nana nawale ʼenoʼenova.
40027009	Omoʼe ʼinega tovesimasimana Ielemaia ena vona ana aqiaqi ʼifoqe, mana lova Buki Nugwenugweina ʼinaya vonaya, “Me Isileli tauna ana veʼia iaʼuya siliba adi yau 30 ʼidewani. Ta mane~nana iʼewedi,
40027010	ʼinega toʼabi ʼulena ena bwaʼobwaʼo igimwanea, ʼidewani egu Kaiwabu ena vematamagilafu ʼiguya.”
40027011	ʼInega Ieisu me Loma edi gavana Failato ʼiawanaya tovolo ta Failato vetalaʼaiea vonaya, “Uvonegu, nage oʼa me Diu edi Kini?” ʼInega Ieisu vonaya, “Niʼa uvona ʼidewani.”
40027012	ʼInega toveguba qiduqiduadi wese ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo Ieisu iveʼewea Failato matanaya, ta Ieisu ge taha tolaʼai weaqina davona ʼeviviedi.
40027013	ʼInega Failato vonaya, “Maʼoda, nage edi veʼewa ʼiuya unoqolia?”
40027014	Ta Ieisu ge taha tolaʼai davonei edi veʼewayavo weaqina, ʼinega Failato nuana voqana qiduana.
40027015	Yaʼwala ʼaidega ʼaidega ʼidia ʼAuvivia Sagalina ʼinaya gavana ena ilivu baʼe ʼidewani: Tomotau qabudi luaqiaqiedi be taha tomotau ina venuaʼivinea be naʼifoqe vanue ʼebeyoqona ʼinega, e ʼinega gavana~nana tomotauna nayavuia nahaʼuʼifoqeyea ʼidia.
40027016	Tuta baʼe ʼinaya ʼoloto taha vanue ʼebeyoqona ʼinaya toatoa ana wawa Balabasi, ta tomotau qabudi niʼa ialamania tauna ʼoloto veifa otaqina.
40027017	ʼInega tomotau ivaʼauta ta Failato vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Toʼoloto nuanuami ena yavui weaqimi, nage Balabasi nage Ieisu tauna igabea Toʼetoyavua?”
40027018	Ta Failato ena vetalaʼai baʼe ʼiuna, mana niʼa alamani aqiaqiea Ieisu iveʼifiʼifiea, ʼinega ikafia ta imiea ʼinaya sabi luvinena.
40027019	Tuta~nana Failato nawale toatoa ʼebevekotu ana ʼivi ʼinaya ta qabu diavona vevetalaʼaiedi, ta ʼinega moqanena vale ivetunei ivonaya, “Ge taha tolaʼai una viaqi baʼe ʼoloto~nana ʼinaya, mana velovanaya veʼwayoqega visiqa qiduana yalutonovia weaqina, ʼinega yahalamania tauna toatoa maiqina.”
40027020	Ta toveguba qiduqiduadi be wese ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo qabu diavona iluvetuvetunedi ina venoqi Failato ʼinaya be Balabasi nayavui ʼidia ta ʼesi Ieisu ʼaliga nalobea.
40027021	ʼInega Failato qabu diavona wese vetalaʼaiedi, “Magilafudi ʼidiega togama nuanuami ena yavui weaqimi?” ʼInega ivoneaya, “Nuanuama Balabasi!”
40027022	Ta Failato vonaya, “Tolaʼai ena viaqi Ieisu ʼinaya, tauna igabea Toʼetoyavua?” ʼInega tomotau qabudi ena vona iveʼevivia ivonaya, “ʼEtoluai ʼinaya kana tutuveʼewea!”
40027023	ʼInega Failato vonedi, “Tolaʼai ena luveifana ʼinega naʼaliga?” Ta qabu diavona ikolua qiduana ivonaya, “ʼEtoluai ʼinaya kana tutuveʼewea!”
40027024	ʼInega Failato tawa alamania ge ana fata be qabu diavona nuadi nagivilei, mana ʼitedi Ieisu ena ʼaliga weaqina iʼalaweloweloloyea be tuta goyona vedavi naʼifoqe. ʼInega goʼilega nimana ʼutuya qabu~dina matadia ʼabo vonaya, “Ge taha wese vona ena ʼinanei ʼimia baʼe ʼoloto~nana ena ʼaliga weaqina. ʼInega yaʼa toatoa maiqigu, ta ʼesi taumiega ona luvinea.”
40027025	Ta qabudi ivonaya, “Taʼiwa, ena ʼaliga ana vita imaʼa natumavo maega ana ʼavalea.”
40027026	ʼInega Failato Balabasi yavuia ʼidia, ta Ieisu veʼineiea ena toluaviayavo ʼidia ta vonedi wayo metametanega ina vunuqa dadanea, ta ʼabiboda ina tutuveʼewea ʼetoluai ʼinaya.
40027027	ʼInega gavana Failato ena toluaviayavo Ieisu itauyea edi ʼebetoa ʼinaya, ta ediavo qabudi igaba vaʼauqidi imai Ieisu itovolo vivilia.
40027028	ʼInega ana kaleko ivaulia ta kaleko bweabweala otaqina ivekalekoya,
40027029	ta ana biatuli talitaliega iviaqia ʼinega ʼunuʼununaya iaʼuya, ta kewala ana ʼataqiega ivekafia ta wese ʼiawanaya tuqatuqadiega isobadi ta igivenuʼwea ivonaya, “Kaiwa, oʼa me Diu edi Kini Qiduana.”
40027030	E wese igidaʼwea be ena kewala iʼewea ʼinega ʼunuʼununa ivunuqia.
40027031	ʼInega igivenuʼwei gumwala ʼabo kaleko bweabwealina ivataʼia ta ana kalekoyega ivekaleko ʼeviviea, ʼinega itauyea sabi tutuveʼewana.
40027032	Tuta~nana Ieisu iʼifoqeyei ta itautauyea ʼedaya e ʼinega Sailini ʼolotona taha ana wawa Saimoni ilobea, ta iluvetunei be Ieisu ana ʼetoluai naʼavalea.
40027033	ʼInega ʼavalea ana laba iʼifoqe ʼabaga Goligota ʼinaya, ta Goligota ana givila “ʼUnuʼunu ana ʼabaga”.
40027034	ʼInega ʼoine be taha yani yuyuna maega iwayavilea ta Ieisu ineia vonigo danuma, ta ʼalatonovia ʼinega nogea.
40027035	ʼInega ʼetoluai ʼinaya Ieisu itutuveʼewea. ʼAbibodanaya toluaviayavo Ieisu ana kaleko iʼewedi ta nuanidia taha laha iviaqia be togama nanugweta ʼinega kaleko~nana naʼewedi.
40027036	E ʼabiboda omoʼe ʼinaya itoabui ta Ieisu iʼitamakia.
40027037	Ta ana ʼetoluai debanaya ena ʼaliga ʼiuna iʼwayavia baʼe ʼidewani, Baʼe Ieisu tauna me Diu edi Kini
40027038	Ta wese tovanawala magilafudi Ieisu maega itutuveʼewedi, taha ana ʼataqiega ta taha ana keliega.
40027039	ʼInega tomotau ivevedelideli ta Ieisu idagidagiei ta wese ivevegilea ivonaya,
40027040	“Oʼa uvona vonigo Vanue Gwalagwalana una qeunia, ta ʼaubena toi ʼinaya wese una yoqona ʼeviviea. Ta ʼeguma oʼa Yaubada Natuna ʼinega tauʼuyega una ʼetoyavuiu ta ʼetoluaiega una webui mai.”
40027041	Wese ʼidewanina toveguba qiduqiduadi be luvine ana toveʼitayavo ta wese ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo Ieisu igivenuʼwea ivonaya,
40027042	“Tauna mali tomotau ʼetoyavuidi ta taunega ge ana fata naʼetoyavui. ʼEguma tauna vonahaqiaqi me Isileli edi Kini, ʼinega ʼetoluaiega nawebui mai e ʼinega kana vetumaqanea.
40027043	Tauna vonigo Yaubada ʼinaya vetumaqana ta vonaya, ‘Yaʼa Yaubada Natuna’, ʼinega kaʼitei nage Yaubada naʼawahaqiaqiei be naʼetoyavuia, waisa?”
40027044	Ta tovanawala~dina Ieisu maega niʼa itutuveʼewedi, taudi wese ʼidewani igivenuʼwea.
40027045	Babaʼauyega be ana laba babaʼau yewavilea ʼinaya ʼabaga qabuna velovana bodea.
40027046	ʼInega 3 koloki ʼidewani Ieisu bonana qiduanega gaba vonaya, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakitani?” Ta ana givila vonaya, “Egu Yaubada, egu Yaubada, tolaʼai weaqina unogegu?”
40027047	ʼInega vaina tomotau diʼwenaya itovotovolo ena gaba inoqolia e ivonaya, “Onoqoli, ʼoloto baʼe Ilaitia gabegabea.”
40027048	ʼInega taha ʼidiega lukwayavoni vihila kikifa ʼewei ta ʼoine yuyuna ʼinaya ʼaubwaʼui, ʼinega taha ʼaiwe ʼinaya ʼidawayea ta veʼetovaneyea Ieisu ʼawanaya vonigo davenumea.
40027049	Ta enavo ivonaya, “Taʼiwa, ta kana baʼe tonova, nage Ilaitia namai naʼetoyavuia.”
40027050	ʼInega Ieisu wese bonana agonega gaba ʼevivi ʼabo yawaina gumwala.
40027051	Ta tuta~nana Ieisu yawaina gumwala, ʼinega Vanue Gwalagwalana gamonaya ʼawa ana bagina kaleko eabu magilafuyea debanega be webui ʼayanaya ta wese mwaniʼiniʼi veniʼi, ʼinega dabo qiduqiduadi fisala yavuledi,
40027052	ta wese debaʼunu ʼawadi ʼeluʼeqauya. Ta tovetumaqana ʼeala lova yawaidi gumwala mayawaidi iyaʼitoto ʼevivi.
40027053	ʼInega Ieisu ena yaʼitoto ʼevivi ʼabibodanaya toyaʼitoto ʼevivi~dina wese ʼabaga gwalagwalana Ielusalema ʼinaya ilugu, ta tomotau ʼeala iʼitedi.
40027054	Toluavia~dina me edi tovanugweta nawale Ieisu iʼitaʼitamakia ta tuta~nana mwaniʼiniʼi be yani qabuna iʼifoqe, ʼinega imwaniniva qiduana ta ivonaya, “Vonahaqiaqi, ʼoloto baʼena Yaubada Natu Otaqina.”
40027055	Ta vivine ʼeala baʼe yani diavona luluvaiega ivevekovedi, taudi lova Galiliega Ieisu iʼabibodea ana toiulayavo ʼidewani.
40027056	Vivine diavona ʼidiega taha ana wawa Meli Magidala, ta wese taha Meli taudi Iemesa ma taina Iosefa inadi. Ta wese Sebedi moqanena maega ivevekova.
40027057	Niʼa velavilaviea ʼinega taha ʼoloto kaikaiwabuna ana wawa Iosefa ʼifoqe, tauna Alimatia ʼolotona ta wese Ieisu ana toʼabiboda.
40027058	ʼInega Iosefa tauya gavana Failato ʼinaya, ta venoqiea Ieisu ʼwafina weaqina. ʼInega Failato awafela ta ena toluaviayavo vonedi Ieisu ʼwafina ina neia.
40027059	ʼInega Iosefa ma enavo Ieisu ʼwafina iʼewea ta kaleko kuena ta wadawadaeana ʼinega iumea.
40027060	ʼInega Iosefa~nana ana debaʼunu ʼevauna ʼinaya Ieisu aʼuya. Ta debaʼunu~nana lova dabo ʼinaya alea ana ʼita kavona vetoa. Aʼu gumwala, ʼinega dabo ʼenaʼina ta beabeana ʼinega debaʼunu~nana ʼaubodea, ta ʼabibodanaya tauya.
40027061	Ta Meli Magidala ma waviana debaʼunu~nana diʼwenaya itoabui ta ivevekova.
40027062	Ieisu itutuveʼewea me Diu edi ʼaubena ʼivaʼavaʼata ʼinaya. Ta mahala vulihia ʼinega edi ʼaubena tafwalolo ʼinaya toveguba qiduqiduadi ta wese Falisiavo itauya gavana Failato ʼinaya sabi ʼitana,
40027063	ta ivoneaya, “Kaiwabu, touʼava~nana lova tuta~nana nawale mayawaina toatoa ena vona anuaveʼavinia vonaya, ‘ʼAubena toi ʼabibodanaya ʼaligega ena yaʼitoto ʼevivi.’
40027064	ʼInega nage ana fata be toluaviayavo una luvetunedi be debaʼunu~nana ina ʼitamaki aqiaqiea ana laba ʼaubena toi ina gumwala, fole Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo ina mai be ʼwafina ina vanawali, e ʼinega tomotau ina uʼavedi vonigo Ieisu ʼaligega tawa yaʼitoto ʼevivi. ʼInega baʼe uʼava~nana uʼava nugwenugweina naveqidua vaʼinea.”
40027065	Failato edi nuanua ʼawahaqiaqiea, ʼinega vonedia, “Emi toʼitamakiavo egu toluavia ʼidiega ona ʼewedi ona tauyedi be debaʼunu~nana ina ʼitamaki aqiaqiea.”
40027066	ʼInega taudi Falisi be toveguba ta wese toluavia itauya debaʼunu~nana ʼinaya ta ʼawana ana ʼauboda ʼinaya taha ʼebeʼita iaʼuya ʼinega ge taha toga ana fata ʼauboda~nana nagitonovi. ʼInega toluavia~dina ivetovolodi debaʼunu~nana ʼinaya be ina ʼitamaki aqiaqiea, ʼabo itauya.
40028001	Me Diu edi Sabate tawa gumwala, ʼinega wiki ana ʼaubena nugweta ʼinaya ʼawaʼawai otaqaya Meli Magidala ma waviana iyaʼitoto itauya Ieisu ana debaʼunu sabi ʼitana.
40028002	ʼInega mwaniʼiniʼi qiduana ʼifoqe, mana Kaiwabu ena tovaleʼewa mahalega webui mai ta debaʼunu ana ʼauboda dabo ʼuvekawawa naqoyei, ʼinega vane debanaya toabui.
40028003	Ta tovaleʼewana ana ʼita kavonaya namala ʼwaiʼwaia be wese ana kaleko wadawadaea otaqina.
40028004	Debaʼunu ana toʼitamakiavo tovaleʼewa~nana iʼitea ʼinega giwalidi aʼala ta idedela igivelukabwebwe bwaʼobwaʼoya adi ʼita kavona ida ʼaliga ʼidewani.
40028005	ʼInega tovaleʼewa~nana vivine magilafudi vonedi vonaya, “Ge ona mwaniniva! Niʼa yahalamania omiʼa Ieisu osalisalia tauna itutuveʼewea ʼetoluai ʼinaya.
40028006	Ta tauna ge baʼidia, ta ʼesi niʼa yaʼitoto ʼevivi ʼaligega, lova ena vona ʼidewani. Omai oʼitei ana ʼivimo.
40028007	Ta ona lukwayavoni ona tauya ana toʼabibodayavo ona vonedi, ‘Ieisu niʼau ʼaligega yaʼitoto ʼevivi, ta nanugweta diʼwe Galili ʼinaya ta omiʼa ona ʼabiboda, ta omoʼe ʼinaya ona ʼitea’. Tolaʼai niʼa yavonemi e ona nuaveʼavinia.”
40028008	ʼInega vivine~dina ilukwayavoni debaʼunu inogea ta me edi mwaniniva ta wese me edi qaiawa itauya Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo ʼidia sabi vonadi.
40028009	Nawale itautauya, ʼinega Ieisu ʼifoqe ʼidia vonaya, “Kaiwa.” ʼInega inaqo ʼinaya ta tuqatuqadiega isobadi ta ʼaqenaya ikafi ta ihiwaʼodu ʼinaya.
40028010	Ta Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Ge ona mwaniniva, ta ona tauya egwavo ʼidia be ona vematamagilafuyedi ina tauya Galili ʼinaya, be omoʼe ʼinaya ina ʼitegu.”
40028011	Vivine~dina nawale itautauya ʼedaya ta debaʼunu ana toʼitamaki vaina itauya ʼabaga Ielusalema ʼinaya, ta tolaʼai niʼa ʼifoqe iʼitea wese ivematamagilafu toveguba qiduqiduadi ʼidia.
40028012	ʼInega tovegubayavo ta wese ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo itoavaʼauta adi ʼaidega idima govaqa, ʼabo mane ʼenaʼina debaʼunu ana toʼitamakiavo ineidi,
40028013	ta ivonedi ivonaya, “Tomotau ona vonedi ona vonaya, ‘Velovelovanaya aʼeno motaiva aʼenoʼeno ta ʼinega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo imai ta ʼwafina ivanawalia!’”
40028014	Ta wese ivonedi ivonaya, “ʼEguma gavana Failato vale baʼe nanoqolia nawale ana uʼavea ʼinega ge diana navilei ʼimia.”
40028015	ʼInega toʼitamaki edi mane iʼewei ta tovegubayavo be wese ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo edi nuanua iʼabibodea. ʼInega baʼe uʼava~nana Ieisu ʼwafina weaqina valena yawala dadana me Diu ʼidia, ta baʼitaga wese ʼidewani ivonavona dadanea.
40028016	ʼInega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo adi yau leveni itauya Galili ʼinaya ʼabo bwanagana Ieisu niʼa vetalatutulea ʼinaya iʼwatovu.
40028017	Ta tuta~nana Ieisu iʼitea ʼinega ihiwaʼodu ʼinaya. Ta vaina ʼidiega nawale me edi venuana magilafu.
40028018	ʼInega Ieisu mai diʼwedia ta vonedi vonaya, “Tamagu ena waiwai ta ena luvine niʼa neigu be yani qabuna mahalaya ta wese bwaʼobwaʼoya ena luvinedi.
40028019	ʼInega ona tauya diʼwe qabuna ʼidia ona lugaihi tomotau ʼidia be ina vetoʼabiboda weaqigu. Ta wese ona givebabitaisodi Tamagu ana wawega be Natuna yaʼa agu wawega ta wese Niboana Gwalagwalana ana wawega.
40028020	Ta luvine qabudi niʼa yaneimi ona veʼitedi ta ina matayagedi. Vonahaqiaqi, yaʼa tuta qabuna omiʼa maega kana toatoa ana laba bwaʼobwaʼo ana ʼebeluʼovoa ʼinaya.”
41001001	Baʼe Vale Aqiaqina ana ʼebeveʼale Ieisu Keliso weaqina, tauna Yaubada Natuna.
41001002	Lova Yaubada ena tovesimasimana Aisea Ieisu Valena maduʼwayavia vonaya, “Baʼe egu tovaletuyana yavetunei nugwenugweta weaqiu be ʼeda naqadalia.
41001003	Ta diʼwe ʼavaʼavaya bonana qiduanega vegabagaba, vonaya, ‘Kaiwabu ena ʼeda ona qadalia ta ona givetuvetunuqia.’”
41001004	ʼInega Ioni Togivebabitaiso ʼifoqe mai diʼwe ʼavaʼavana ʼinaya ta lugaihi tomotau ʼidia vonaya, “Emi ilivu luveifadi ʼidiega ona nuagivila ta ʼinega ena givebabitaisomi ta Yaubada emi ilivu diavona nanuataqodi.”
41001005	Ta tomotau Ielusalemega ta wese diʼwe Iudia ʼabaganavo ʼidiega ivaʼauta imai Ioni ena gaihi sabi noqolina. Ta wese edi ilivu luveifadi isimana ʼifoqeyedi, e ʼinega givebabitaisodi goʼila Iolidani ʼinaya.
41001006	Ta Ioni ana kaleko yubai kameli vutuvutudiega, ta ana gadiʼwana yubai ʼwafidiega, ta ana ʼabwagayavo wakifou be wese muʼawa.
41001007	Ta Ioni lugaihi vonaya, “Tauna ʼabibodaguyega maimai veago vaʼinegu, ʼinega ge daluaqiaqiegu be ʼaqenaya ena iwaʼodu ta ana ʼaqeyafayafa ena liʼami.
41001008	Yaʼa goʼilega yagigivebabitaisomi ta tauna Niboana Gwalagwalanega nagivebabitaisomi.”
41001009	Ta omoʼe tutana ʼinaya Ieisu diʼwe Galili gamonaya ʼabaga Nasaleta nogea ta mai goʼila Iolidani ʼinaya, e ʼinega Ioni Ieisu givebabitaisoya.
41001010	Ta Ieisu niʼau goʼilega fweula, ʼinega ʼita vane mahala ʼitea ʼelalamia, ta Niboana Gwalagwalana ana ʼita kavona malasi webui mai ʼinaya.
41001011	ʼInega taha bona mahalega vonaya, “Oʼa Natu aqiaqigu yaveloyubeu ta weaqiu yaqaiawa qiduana.”
41001012	Ta tuta omoʼe ʼinaya Yaubada Niboanina Ieisu luvetunea tauya diʼwe ʼavaʼava ʼinaya.
41001013	Ta ʼaubena 40 omoʼe ʼinaya toatoa, ta ʼaubena diavona ʼidia Seitani Ieisu sitonovia, ta diʼwe~nana ʼinaya wese yubai sasasadi itoatoa, ta Yaubada ena tovaleʼewayavo Ieisu iʼitamakia.
41001014	Toluvine qiduana Elodi Anitifasi ena luvineyega Ioni niʼa iaʼuluguyea vanue ʼebeyoqona ʼinaya. ʼInega Ieisu ʼevivi tauya diʼwe Galili ʼinaya ta Vale Aqiaqina Yaubada ʼinega lugaihiea,
41001015	vonaya, “Tuta niʼa ʼifoqe, be Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine niʼa mai diʼwedaya. ʼInega emi luveifayavo ʼidiega ona nuagivila ta Vale Aqiaqina ona vetumaqanea!”
41001016	ʼInega taha tuta Ieisu lavu Galili balabalanega luluvivila, ʼinega ʼoloto magilafudi Saimoni ma taina Anidulu ʼitedi ta edi gomana ibwaʼubwaʼuya, mana taudi toluʼiqana.
41001017	Ta Ieisu gabedi vonaya, “Omai, ona ʼabibodegu ta ena ʼivaʼavaʼaimi ʼinega omiʼa tomotau ona ʼonedi.”
41001018	ʼInega lukwayavonega edi gomana inogedi ta Ieisu iʼabibodea.
41001019	ʼInega wese tufwana vanaqo ta Iemesa be Ioni, taudi Sebedi natunavo wagaya itoatoa ta edi gomana iʼivaʼavaʼaidi.
41001020	Ta tuta~nana Ieisu ʼitedi ʼinega wese ʼidewani gabedi, ta tamadi me ena tofewayavo wagaya inogedi ta Ieisu iʼabibodea.
41001021	Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo imai ʼabaga Kafaneumi ʼinaya ta Sabatea vanue tafwaloloya Ieisu lugu ta veʼale veʼita.
41001022	Ta tomotau qabudi nuadi voqana ena veʼita weaqina, mana gebu luvine ana toveʼitayavo edi veʼita ʼidewani, ta ʼesi me ena luvine ta wese me ena waiwai veveʼitedi.
41001023	Ta vanue tafwalolo~nana ʼinaya taha ʼoloto toatoa, tauna niboana luveifana niʼa luguya, ʼinega tuta baʼe ʼinaya ʼoloto~nana Ieisu gabea,
41001024	vonaya, “Ieisu, oʼa Nasaleta ʼolotou, tolaʼai weaqina umai ʼimaya? Nuanuau vonigo una fofolima, waisa? Ta niʼa yahalamaniu, oʼa Yaubada Natuna Gwalagwalau.”
41001025	Ta Ieisu luvinea vonaya, “ʼEloveu! ʼOloto benaʼe ʼinega uʼifoqe mai!”
41001026	ʼInega niboana luveifana ʼoloto~nana luvededeli, ta me ena kolua ʼoloto~nana ʼinega ʼifoqe.
41001027	Ta tomotau qabudi nuadi voqana ta taudiega iveveqae ivonaya, “Baʼe ai veʼita, mana yani vauvauna kaʼitea! Ta ʼoloto~nana me ena luvine waiwaina, ta wese niboana luveifadi luvinedi ta ena vona ivematamatayagea.”
41001028	Ta Ieisu ena viaqa valena lukwayavonega yawala dadana diʼwe Galili ʼabaganavo ʼidia.
41001029	Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo vanue tafwaloloyega iʼifoqe, ʼinega Saimoni ma taina Anidulu ediavo Ieisu be Iemesa ta wese Ioni iʼebeʼewedi itauyedi edi vanuea.
41001030	Ta Saimoni lawana ʼwafidi luʼweaʼweava ta me edi vihiqa ʼivia iʼenoʼeno, ʼinega Ieisu ivematamagilafuyea tovevihiqa~dina weaqidi.
41001031	ʼInega Ieisu lugu ʼidia ta nimadia kafi ta siveyaʼitotodi, ta vavine adi vihiqa awala. Niʼa iveaqiaqi ʼinega ʼabwaga iʼivaʼavaʼaia Ieisu ma enavo weaqidi.
41001032	Niʼau babaʼau lia ʼunuva ʼinega tomotau edi tovevihiqayavo ta wese tomeqabu niboana luveifadi iʼwahalidi maega imiedi Ieisu ʼinaya.
41001033	Ta wese ʼabaga~nana ana totoayavo qabudi ivaʼauta imai vanue~nana masuʼedaninaya.
41001034	Ta Ieisu tomotau mali vihiqa be mali vihiqa ʼidiega giveaqiaqiedi. Ta wese niboana luveifadi ʼwavinidi iʼifoqe ta awatayedi ge ina vevonavonayei, mana niʼa ialamania tauna Yaubada Natuna.
41001035	ʼAwaʼawai otaqa matavelovelovanaya Ieisu yaʼitoto ta ana ʼaidega vanuega ʼifoqe, ta tauya taha diʼwe tomotau geqanaya sabi venoqi.
41001036	ʼInega Saimoni ma enavo wese iwebui, ta Ieisu isalia.
41001037	Ta tuta~nana ilobea ivoneaya, “Tomotau qabudi isalisaliu!”
41001038	Ta Ieisu vonedia, “Kana tauya vaina ʼabaga diʼwedaya, ta ʼidia ena lugaihi, mana tauna fewana weaqina yamai.”
41001039	ʼInega Ieisu tauya Galili ʼabaganavo ʼidia ta edi vanue tafwalolo ʼidia lugaihi ta wese niboana luveifadi ʼwavinidi iʼifoqe.
41001040	Taha ʼoloto ʼwagoʼwagoina mai Ieisu ʼinaya ta tuqatuqanega sobadi ta venoqi vonaya, “ʼEguma nuanuau una giveaqiaqiegu, mana oʼa au fata.”
41001041	ʼInega Ieisu nuakolokoloyea ta nimana siʼotoia ta ʼoloto~nana ʼwafina gitonovia ta vonaya, “ʼAo eu nuanua ena viaqia, uvevunavunaqa ta uveaqiaqi!”
41001042	Ta ʼoloto~nana ana ʼwagota lukwayavonega ʼevutuqia ta veaqiaqi.
41001043	Ta Ieisu ʼoloto~nana luvetunea natauya ta wese luvine waiwaina neia vonaya,
41001044	“Ge taha toga ʼinaya una vesimasimanegu, ta ʼesi tunutunuqina una tauya toveguba ʼinaya ta tauʼu una veʼitayeu. ʼInega toveguba~nana naʼiteu naʼawahaqiaqieu, ta wese mali tomotau ina alamania niʼa uveaqiaqi. Ta wese eu guba una ʼewea be una vegubayea Yaubada ʼinaya, lova ʼidewani ada luvine Mosese ʼinega.”
41001045	Ta ʼoloto~nana Ieisu ena luvine ge daʼabibodei, ta ʼesi tomotau qabudi ʼidia vesimasimanea. Baʼe ʼiuna ʼinega Ieisu ge ana fata davasimasimatala ʼabaga diavona ʼidia, ta ʼinega tauya diʼwe tomotau geqana ʼidia. Ta tua nawale tomotau imaimai ʼinaya ʼabaga taha taha ʼidiega.
41002001	ʼAubena vaina gumwala ʼinega Ieisu ʼevivi mai Kafaneumi ʼinaya. Ta valena tomotau niʼa inoqolia vanuea toatoa.
41002002	ʼInega tomotau qabudi ivaʼauta vanue~nana gamonaya ta wese masuʼedaninaya, ta Ieisu Yaubada ena vona lugaihiea ʼidia.
41002003	Ta ʼabaga~nana ʼinaya taha ʼoloto toatoa duʼuna qabudi belubeluna, ta enavo adi yau foa iʼavalei imiea Ieisu ʼinaya.
41002004	Ta ge adi fata iadi ida luguyei mana qabu qidua vaʼinedi vanue~nana iluveagatunaʼia. ʼInega iʼavalei ivaneqea vanue debanaya ʼabo ʼubu iqaʼuya ta ma ʼivina wayoyega ivekalilia webui Ieisu ʼiawanaya.
41002005	Ta Ieisu toʼavala~dina edi vetumaqana ʼitea, ʼinega ʼoloto belubelu~nana ʼinaya vonaya, “Natugu, eu luveifayavo niʼa yanuataqodi!”
41002006	Ta vaina luvine ana toveʼitayavo Ieisu diʼwenaya itoatoa ena vona inoqolia ta taudiega ivetalaʼaiedi ivonaya,
41002007	“Maʼoda baʼe ʼoloto~nana vonavona ʼaiqa? Vonahaqiaqi, taunega givaneyea kavona Yaubada ʼidewani. Mana Yaubada ana ʼaidega otaqa ana fata luveifana nanuataqodi.”
41002008	Ta Ieisu nuanega edi nuanua niʼa alamania ʼinega vonedi vonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina benaʼe ʼidewani onuanua ʼaiqa?
41002009	Ta isana maʼoda ena vona ʼaiqa ʼoloto belubeluna baʼe ʼinaya? Nage ena vonaya, ‘Eu ilivu luveifana niʼau yanuataqodi’, nage ena vonaya, ‘Uyaʼitoto, eu ʼebana uʼavala utauya?’
41002010	Ta nuanuagu ona alamania yaʼa Tomotau Natuna me egu luvine waiwaina bwaʼobwaʼoya, ʼinega luaqiaqiegu be tomotau edi ilivu luveifana ena nuataqodi.” ʼInega Ieisu belubelu~nana vonea vonaya,
41002011	“Yavoneu, uyaʼitoto eu ʼebana uʼavalei ta utauya eu ʼabagaya.”
41002012	ʼInega yaʼitoto ta ena ʼebana ʼewei, ta qabu matadiega ʼifoqe tauya. E omoʼe ʼinaya tomotau qabudi nuadi voqana ta Yaubada iawatuboya ivonaya, “Lova baʼe yanina ge taha tuta kada ʼitea.”
41002013	ʼInega Ieisu ʼevivi lavu Galili ʼinaya, ta balabalaya toatoa. E ʼinega tomotau qabudi imai ʼinaya ta itoa vivilia, ʼinega veʼale veʼitedi.
41002014	Veʼitedi gumwala ʼinega tautauya, ta taha takesi ana toʼewa ʼitea vanue ʼebefewa ʼinaya toatoa. Ana wawa Libai, tauna Alifio natuna, ta Ieisu voneaya, “Umai uʼabibodegu!” ʼInega Libai yaʼitoto ta Ieisu ʼabibodea.
41002015	Ta tuta~nana Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo ilugu Libai ena vanuea sabi ʼai, ʼinega takesi ana toʼewayavo ʼeala be wese toveilivu veifa maega itoabui ta iʼai, mana baʼe tomotau diavona qabudi Ieisu iʼabibodea.
41002016	ʼInega Falisi taudi luvine ana toveʼitayavo Ieisu iʼitea, ʼinega ana toʼabibodayavo ivetalaʼaiedi ivonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina emi toveʼita takesi ana toʼewayavo be wese toluveifadi maega iʼaiʼai?”
41002017	Ta Ieisu edi vona baʼe noqolia ʼinega vonedi vonaya, “Taudi aqiaqidi ge nuanuadi togiveaqiaqi, ta ʼesi tovevihiqa nuanuadi togiveaqiaqi. Yaʼa ge eda mai tunutunuqidi weaqidi ta ʼesi yamai toluveifadi sabi iuladi.”
41002018	Ioni Togivebabitaiso ana toʼabibodayavo ta wese Falisiavo vaina tuta ivedede edi tafwalolo weaqina. ʼInega vaina tomotau imai Ieisu ʼinaya ta ivetalaʼaiea ivonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina oʼa au toʼabibodayavo ge ida vedede, mana Ioni ana toʼabibodayavo ta wese Falisiavo adi toʼabibodayavo ivevedede?”
41002019	ʼInega Ieisu vona sesebaiega vonedi vonaya, “Tolaʼai ana aqiaqi ʼeguma vaqi ana toyoʼoyavo ina vedede tuta~nana tovaqi meʼolotona maega itoatoa? Ge taha wese ana aqiaqi! Mana tauna ma enavo qabudi ina qaiawa.
41002020	Ta nawale tuta maimai ʼinaya tovaqi~nana ina kafia be ina tauyea, ʼinega enavo me edi nuavita ina vedede.”
41002021	Ta wese vona sesebaiega vonedi vonaya, “Ge ana fata be kaleko vauvauna matavusinega kaleko ʼituʼituwaina kana bwabwadei. Ge daluaqiaqiea, mana nawale kana ʼutuya ʼinega bwabwada vauvauna nabwagogoma, ta kaleko ʼituʼituwainana ena eabu nagiveʼenaʼia.
41002022	Ta wese ge taha toga ʼoine vauvauna naiwaqa ukamanei wage ʼituʼituwaina yubai ʼwafidiega ʼinaya, mana nawale nanabahabuya, e ʼinega ʼoine~nana ta wese wage~nana ina luveifa. Ta ʼesi luaqiaqiea be ʼoine vauvauna kana iwaqia wage vauvauna yubai ʼwafidiega gamonaya.”
41002023	Sabate taha ʼinaya Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo vaoqa gamonega itautauya ta witi vuaqina ma walona iʼegigoluya ta iʼaiʼai.
41002024	Ta Falisi iʼitedi ʼinega Ieisu ivonea ivonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina au toʼabibodayavo ifewafewa ta Sabate ana luvine iludewa kavokavovoyei?”
41002025	ʼInega Ieisu veʼiedi vonaya, “Nage ge oda avoi Buki Nugwenugweina ʼinaya tolaʼai Deibida ma enavo iviaqia tuta~nana botana gegoyo ilutonovia?
41002026	Yaubada ena vanuea lugu ta beledi gwalagwalana ʼewei ʼabo ʼai. Ta beledi~nana ma ana luvine toveguba dimo adi luaqiaqi be ina ʼainia. Ta tua mana ibotana, ʼinega Deibida beledi~nana ʼewei ta wese enavo neidi ʼabo iʼai. Ta baʼe yani~nana iviaqia lova toveguba edi tovanugweta Abiata ena tutaya.”
41002027	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Yaubada Sabate viaqia tomotau weaqidi, ta tomotau ge daviaqidi Sabate weaqina.
41002028	Ta yavona aqiaqiemi, yaʼa Tomotau Natuna yani qabuna yaluviluvinedi, ta wese yaʼa Sabate ana Kaiwabu.”
41003001	Ta ʼinega wese Ieisu ʼevivi mai vanue tafwalolo ʼinaya, ta ʼoloto taha nimana belubeluna ʼitea toatoa.
41003002	Ta Falisi vaina Ieisu ivevekovea ʼeguma baʼe ʼoloto~nana nagiveaqiaqiea Sabatea, be ʼinega ina veʼewei ta ina kafia.
41003003	ʼInega Ieisu ʼoloto~nana vonea vonaya, “Umai baʼidia, ta tomotau matadia utovolo!”
41003004	ʼInega Ieisu Falisi vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Toyani luaqiaqieda be kana viaqi Sabatea? Nage yani aqiaqina kana viaqi, nage luveifana kana viaqi? Nage tomotau kana ʼetoyavuidi, nage kana luveʼaligidi?” Ta Ieisu ena vona baʼe ge ida veʼiea.
41003005	ʼInega Ieisu me ena gamosoala ʼita givila ta ʼita makimakidi, ta wese nuana vita edi vedeba ʼiʼwana weaqina. ʼInega ʼoloto~nana voneaya, “Nimau usiʼotoi!” ʼInega nimana siʼotoia ta veaqiaqi ʼevivi.
41003006	ʼInega Falisiavo iʼifoqe itauya toluvine qiduana Elodi ena tomotauyavo ʼidia, ta adi ʼaidega idima govaqa maʼoda Ieisu ina luveʼaliga ʼaiqei.
41003007	ʼInega Ieisu nogedi ta ma ana toʼabibodayavo itauya lavu ʼinaya, ta qabu qiduana Galili ʼinega italaʼobea.
41003008	Ta wese vaina qabu Ieisu ena viaqayavo valena inoqolia, ʼinega Iudia be, Ielusalema be, Idumea be Iolidani diʼwenavo ʼidiega ta wese Taia be Saidoni ʼabaganavo ʼidiega ivaʼauta imai.
41003009	-
41003010	Ta Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo vonedi waga taha goyona ina miea weaqina, mana tovevihiqa qabudi niʼa giveaqiaqiedi, ʼinega wese vaidi tovevihiqa ivevetunuefaefala nuanuadi Ieisu ina gitonovia.
41003011	Ta tuta~nana tomotau diavona niboana luveifadi niʼau iʼwahalidi Ieisu iʼitea ʼinega matanaya igivelukabwebwe ta ikolua ivonaya, “Oʼa Yaubada Natuna.”
41003012	ʼInega Ieisu niboana luveifadi luvine waiwaina neidi vonaya, “Ge tomotau ʼidia ona vevonavonayegu yaʼa togama!”
41003013	-
41003014	Ta ʼabibodanaya Ieisu ʼwatovu taha bwanaga ʼinaya, ta ena nuenuega tomotau gabedi ta imai ʼinaya. Ta tomotau diavona ʼidiega Ieisu ʼoloto adi yau tuwelo venuaʼivinedi, ta vonedi vonaya, “Omiʼa tuwelo mina yavenuaʼivinemi egu tovaletuyanayavo, ta omiʼa be yaʼa maega kana toa, ta ʼabiboda ena vetunemi tomotau ʼidia ona lugaihi.
41003015	Ta egu waiwai ena neimi ʼinega ami fata niboana luveifadi tomotau ʼidiega ona ʼwavinidi ina ʼifoqe.”
41003016	Tuwelo diavona adi wawayavo baʼe: Saimoni (tauna Ieisu gabea Fita),
41003017	ta wese Iemesa ma taina Ioni, taudi Sebedi natunavo ta Ieisu gabedi Bonagesi (ta wawa~nana ana alamani yavalata natunavo),
41003018	ta wese Anidulu be, Filifi be, Batolomio be, Madiu be, Tomasi ta wese taha Iemesa, tauna Alifio natuna, ta wese Tadiasi be, Saimoni tauna Seloti edi qabu gamonega,
41003019	ta wese Iudasa Isakaliota, tauna Ieisu ana tosuluva.
41003020	ʼInega Ieisu ʼevivi mai ena ʼabagaya, ta qabu qiduana ivaʼauta ʼinaya, e ʼinega ge ana fata ma ana toʼabibodayavo ida ʼai.
41003021	Ta tuta~nana Ieisu ena susuyavo valena inoqolia ena fewa ʼinega ge daveyawaia, ʼinega imai sabi ʼebeʼewana ta taudiega ivonaya, “Niʼau vekwavakwava.”
41003022	Ta luvine ana toveʼitayavo Ielusalemega iwebui mai ivonaya, “Belisibubi tauna niboana luveifadi adi tovanugweta. Ta Belisibubi~nana niʼa Ieisu luguya, ta ena waiwaiega niboana luveifadi ʼwaviʼwavi ʼifoqeyedi.”
41003023	ʼInega Ieisu tomotau qabudi gabedi imai ta vona sesebaiega vonedi vonaya, “Seitani ge ana fata Seitani naʼwavi ʼifoqeyei.”
41003024	Ta wese vonaya, “ʼEguma ʼebeluvine taha ʼinaya tomotau ina vetoatoasiʼi, ʼinega nawale ʼebeluvine~nana nadawalili ta nabeʼu.
41003025	Ta wese ʼeguma susu taha nuanidia vetoatoasiʼi naʼifoqe e nawale edi toa naluveifa otaqa.
41003026	Seitani wese ʼidewana, ʼeguma ma enavo taudiega ina vedavi ʼinega edi toa naluveifa ta wese ena ʼebeluvine nahawala.”
41003027	Wese vona sesebaiega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Vonahaqiaqi, ge taha toga ana fata taha ʼoloto waiwaina ena vanuea nalugu ta ena kulufa navanawalidi. Ta ʼeguma tovanawala taha nuanuana nalugu, e ʼinega nugweta tovewaiwai~nana nimana be wese ʼaqena nayoqonidi, ʼinega ana fata vanue~nana ʼinaya nalugu ta kulufa qabuna navanawalidi.
41003028	Ta yavona aqiaqiemi, tomotau edi luveifana ta wese edi vona veifa qabuna Yaubada nanuataqodi,
41003029	ta ʼeguma taha toga Niboana Gwalagwalana naʼawaluveifea ʼinega Yaubada ge ana fata tomotau~nana nanuataqoi, ta ʼesi ena luveifana naʼeno vataya.”
41003030	Baʼe ʼidewana Ieisu vona ʼaiqa mana luvine ana toveʼitayavo ivonaya, “Niboana luveifana niʼa lugu Ieisu ʼinaya, e ʼinega ena waiwaiega fewafewa.”
41003031	ʼInega Ieisu inana ta wese tainavo imai ta vanue masuʼedaninaya itovolo, ʼinega vale ivetunei ʼinaya be vanuega naʼifoqe mai ina veqae.
41003032	Ta tomotau qabudi Ieisu itoa vivilia vale~nana inoqolia ʼinega ivoneaya, “Toveʼita, inau be taimwavo isalisaliu.”
41003033	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Togama inagu ta tomeqabu taigwavo?”
41003034	ʼInega Ieisu qabu~dina itoa vivilia ʼita makimakidi ta vonedi vonaya, “Omiʼa taumi inagwavo ta taigwavo.
41003035	Mana tomeqabu Tamagu ena nuanua iʼabiʼabibodea e taudi taigwavo be, novugwavo ta wese inagwavo.”
41004001	Ieisu ʼevivi mai lavu Galili balabalanaya ta wese veʼale veʼita. Ta tomotau qabudi ivaʼauta imai ʼinaya, e ʼinega Ieisu wagaya gelu ta tufwana talatete, ta tomotau qabudi nawale balabalaya itovotovolo.
41004002	Ta Ieisu qabu~dina vona sesebai ʼinega yani ʼeala weaqidi veʼitedi, ta veʼita diavona ʼidiega taha yani weaqina vonedi vonaya,
41004003	“Ovineneqa! Toveyavula taha tauya ena vaoqaya witi vewanina sabi veyavulina.
41004004	Ta tuta~nana veyavuledi ʼinega vaina vewana iavuta ʼedabalaya, ta manuqa iʼitedi iwebui ta iʼai ʼovoidi.
41004005	Ta vaina iavuta bwaʼo dabodabona ʼinaya, ta ʼinega itabo kwayavona mana bwaʼobwaʼo yalayalana.
41004006	Ta tuta~nana babaʼau vanemai ʼinega guvekwavuqidi, mana kwalamidi ge ida webui bwaʼobwaʼo gamonaya.
41004007	Ta wese vaina vewana talitali gamonaya iavuta ta maega itabo vefofo, ʼinega witi ge adi fata ida vuaqa, mana talitali~nana vewaiwai ta fai veʼaligidi.
41004008	Ta vaina vewana bwaʼobwaʼo aqiaqinaya iavuta itabo ta ivuaqa, ʼinega vewana diavona ʼidiega vaina ivuaqa 30 ʼidewani, ta vaina 60, ta wese vaina 100.”
41004009	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi, “ʼEguma ma teniqami vona baʼe ona noqolia.”
41004010	Ta ena veʼita~nana ʼabibodanaya Ieisu ana ʼaidega toatoa, ʼinega Tuwelo~dina ta wese vaina tomotau maega ivaʼauta Ieisu ʼinaya ta ivetalaʼaiea vona sesebai adi alamani weaqina.
41004011	Ta Ieisu vonaya, “Omiʼa Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine gamona ana alamani aqiaqi niʼau neimi. Ta tomotau qabudi gebu, ʼinega yani qabuna vona sesebaiega yavonevonedi,
41004012	ta lova tovesimasimana Aisea baʼe qabu diavona weaqidi madusimana vonaya, ‘Egu vona inoqonoqolia ta nuadi ge daʼeqaʼui, ta wese egu viaqayavo iʼiteʼitedi ta ana alamani ge ida lobei. Mana ʼeguma ida alamania ʼinega edi luveifayavo ʼidiega ida nuagivila be ʼinega Yaubada danuataqodi.’”
41004013	ʼInega Ieisu vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Nage egu vona sesebai baʼe ge oda nuaʼeqaʼui? Be maʼoda ʼinega vona sesebai gabudi ona alamani ʼaiqedi?
41004014	Ta ena givesimatalia ʼimia, e baʼe: Tovaoqa~nana tauna Yaubada ena vona ana toveyavula.
41004015	Vaina tomotau Yaubada ena vona inoqolia, ʼinega Seitani mai ta ʼidiega vona diavona ʼewa yavuledi, mana baʼe tomotau diavona kavona vewani~dina iavuta ʼedabala ʼinaya.
41004016	-
41004017	Ta vaina tomotau Yaubada ena vona inoqolia, ta me edi qaiawa iawafeledi Vale nana ʼinaya. Ta vona diavona ge dalugu aqiaqi ʼidia, ʼinega tuta kukusana namo ʼidia ʼenova, mana tuta~nana vita nage vevoalana ina lobea vona diavona weaqina, e ʼinega edi vetumaqana lukwayavonega ina nogea, mana baʼe tomotau diavona kavona vewani~dina iavuta bwaʼobwaʼo yalayalana ʼinaya.
41004018	Ta vaina tomotau Yaubada ena vona inoqolia,
41004019	ta kulufa kaikaiwabudi be wese bwaʼobwaʼo ana nuanuayavo nuadi ʼewea ta vona diavona inuafania ʼinega ge adi fata ina vuaqa, mana baʼe tomotau diavona kavona vewana talitali gamonaya iavuta.
41004020	Ta ʼesi vaina tomotau Yaubada ena vona inoqolia ta iʼawahaqiaqiea, ʼinega vaina ivuaqa 30 ʼidewani, ta vaina 60, ta wese vaina 100, mana taudi kavona vewana diavona iavuta bwaʼobwaʼo aqiaqina ʼinaya.”
41004021	Ta Ieisu wese vonedi vonaya, “Lamufa kana gabuya, ta gebu ʼulenega kana talakabubui nage ʼivi ʼayanaya kana aʼukwaivei. Ta ʼesi luaqiaqiea kana aʼuvaneqea ʼebeaʼu debanaya be ʼinega vanue gamona nasimatala.
41004022	Yani qabuna ʼwaiʼwaividi nawale ina ʼifoqe vunavunaqaya. Ta wese yani qabuna bwabwahadi nawale ina ʼifoqe ʼatamanaya.
41004023	ʼEguma ma teniqami vona baʼe ona noqolia!”
41004024	Ta wese vonedia, “Tolaʼai niʼa onoqolia ona nuaveʼavina aqiaqiea. Ta ʼeguma Yaubada ena vona ona noqola aqiaqiea, e ʼinega Yaubada ena vona ona alamania, ta baʼe alamani~nana nagiveqiduea.
41004025	Mana ʼeguma taha toga ena alamani qiduana Yaubada ena vona weaqina, e nawale Yaubada wese nagiveqiduea ʼinaya. Ta ʼeguma taha toga Yaubada ena vona ge nanoqola aqiaqiea, e nawale ena alamani goyona wese Yaubada naʼewa yavulea ʼinega.”
41004026	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine kavonaya taha ʼoloto witi vewanina veyavuledi talaqaya.
41004027	Ta mali fewa be mali fewa vesitaqoya ʼinega ʼevisa ʼaubena ʼabibodanaya vewana diavona ʼitedi niʼa iʼelutabo, ta ʼoloto~nana ge taha yani daviaqia edi tabo weaqina, ta tua taudiega itabotabo,
41004028	mana bwaʼobwaʼo taunega witi~nana vevevuaqia. Nugweta tolobwana nahaʼuya, ta ʼabiboda lovena nasiveyavula, be ʼebeluʼovoa witi walona naludiditanaha.
41004029	Ta tuta~nana witi naʼwauqia ʼinega ʼoloto~nana ena naifiega nabolimanidi, mana bolimana ana tuta niʼa ʼifoqe.”
41004030	Ieisu wese vonedi vonaya, “Maʼoda ʼinega Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine ena givesimatala ʼaiqei ʼimia?
41004031	Nage baʼe ʼidewana ena vetalatutula ʼaiqea: Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine kavona teʼwa vewanina, mana vewani~nana yani goyona.
41004032	Ta ʼeguma kana ʼwadia e ʼabiboda natabo ta yani qabuna vaoqaya itabotabo naveqidua vaʼinedi. Ta wese nalaqa, ʼinega manu ina vaʼauta ta ina nevuqa ʼinaya.”
41004033	Ieisu ena lugaihi tomotau ʼidia tuta qabuna vona sesebai ʼinega veveʼitedi. Ta Ieisu edi alamani ana fata ʼinega veveʼitedi.
41004034	Vonahaqiaqi, ge taha tuta mali veʼita ʼinega daveʼitedi. Ta ʼabiboda ʼeguma Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo adi ʼaidega itoatoa ʼinega vona sesebai qabuna gigivesimatalia ʼidia.
41004035	Ta niʼa velavilaviea ʼinega Ieisu wagega ena lugaihi luʼovoia, ta ana toʼabibodayavo vonedi vonaya, “Omai ogelu, kana vaukamana lavu diʼwenaya.”
41004036	ʼInega igelu ta tomotau qabudi balabalaya inogedi, ta wese vaina tomotau me edi waga maega itauya.
41004037	ʼInega yaqina waiwaina veʼale, ta nufula qiduana waga gamonaya goi ʼeboʼebodea, ʼabo tuta goyona ida damana.
41004038	Ta Ieisu waga yiqunaya ana kunukana niʼa aʼui ta ʼeno motaiva. ʼInega toʼabiboda~dina idivanoya ivoneaya, “Kaiwabu, nage ge uda nuanua weaqida, mana tuta goyona kana damana!”
41004039	ʼInega Ieisu tovolo ta yaqina be nufula lugwaeyedi vonaya, “ʼElovemi!” Tuata yaqina be nufula ʼegwaedi ta daumwala ʼifoqe.
41004040	ʼInega ana toʼabibodayavo vonedi vonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina omwanimwaniniva? Ana ʼita nawale ge oda vetumaqanegu?”
41004041	Ta toʼabiboda~dina imwaniniva qiduana ta taudi ʼidia ivonaya, “Toʼoloto baʼena, mana yani qabuna ena vona imatayagea, ta wese yaqina be nufula bonana ivematamatayagea?”
41005001	ʼInega Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo lavu mali diʼwenega ivaukamana ta me Gelasine edi diʼwe ʼinaya ilugu.
41005002	Ta omoʼe ʼinaya taha ʼoloto niboana luveifadi niʼa iʼwahalia debaʼunuya toatoa. Ta tuta~nana Ieisu wagega webui, ʼinega ʼoloto nana debaʼunuyega ʼifoqe mai ʼinaya.
41005003	Tomotau tuta qabuna ʼaqena be nimana seniega iyoqoyoqonidi,
41005004	ta tua ʼeʼeluhufeufedi, ʼinega ge taha toga ana fata nakafia be nayoqona ʼeviviei.
41005005	ʼAubena wese velovelovana ʼidia yabayaba bwanagaya ta wese debaʼunuya ta tuta qabuna vevekolukolua ta ginausega taunega luludaʼea.
41005006	Ieisu nawale luluvaiega maimai ʼinega ʼoloto~nana ʼita naqo ʼitea. ʼInega vihila tauya ta Ieisu ʼiawanaya tuqatuqanega sobadi ta iwaʼodu.
41005007	-
41005008	ʼInega Ieisu vonea vonaya, “Niboana luveifau, ʼoloto baʼe ʼinega uʼifoqe!” Ta niboana luveifana bonana qiduanega vonaya, “Ei Ieisu, oʼa Yaubada Toatoa Vanena Natuna, tolaʼai nuanuau una viaqi ʼiguya? Ta Yaubada ana wawega una vona fofofola ʼiguya gebu una luvematasabugu.”
41005009	ʼInega Ieisu niboana luveifana vetalaʼaiea vonaya, “Maʼoda au wawa?” E tauna vonaya, “Agu wawa ʼEaʼealima, mana ʼoloto baʼe gamonaya qabuma atoatoa.
41005010	Ta wese avevenoqieu ge una ʼwavi ʼifoqeyema baʼe diʼwe~nana ʼinega.”
41005011	Ta omoʼe bwanaga lilivanaya bawe qabudi iduaduala.
41005012	ʼInega niboana luveifa~dina inoqi Ieisu ʼinaya ivonaya, “Una vetunema be ana lugu omoʼe bawe ʼidia!”
41005013	ʼInega Ieisu awafeledi ta niboani~dina ʼoloto~nana ʼinega iʼifoqe, e bawe ʼidia ilugu. ʼInega bawe~dina qabudi ivihila itauya ta dabega ibeʼu iwebui lavuya idamana. Ta bawe~dina adi yau ʼidewani 2,000.
41005014	Ta bawe adi toʼitamakiavo idena itauya ʼabaga qiduqiduadi be goyogoyodi ʼidia, ta tolaʼai niʼa iʼitea isimana ʼifoqe tomotau qabudi ʼidia. ʼInega totoa ʼabaga~dina imai nuanuadi matadiega ina ʼitea tolaʼai ʼifoqe.
41005015	Imai Ieisu ʼinaya ta ʼoloto~nana lova niboana luveluveifadi iluvekwavea iʼitea ta imwaniniva, mana aqiaqina toatoa ta niʼa vekaleko, be wese ʼunuʼununa veaqiaqi.
41005016	ʼInega taudi yani qabuna niʼa iʼitea matadiega e isimana tomotau ʼidia maʼoda ʼoloto~nana veaqiaqi ʼaiqa, ta wese bawe weaqidi isimana maʼoda iveilaqe ʼaiqa.
41005017	ʼInega totoa ʼabaga Ieisu ivonea ivonaya, “Nuanuama una tauya ta ema ʼabaga una nogea!”
41005018	Tutana Ieisu wagaya gelu, ʼinega ʼoloto~nana lova niboana iʼwahalia mai Ieisu ʼinaya venoqiea vonaya, “Kaiwabu, yaʼa nuanuagu oʼa maega kana tauya.”
41005019	ʼInega Ieisu voneaya, “Ge ana fata, ta ʼesi una ʼevivi una tauya eu gadeavo ʼidia. Ta maʼoda Yaubada ena nuakolokoloyega giveaqiaqi ʼaiqeu una simanea ʼidia, ta ina noqolia.”
41005020	ʼInega ʼoloto~nana tauya Dikafoli ʼabaganavo ʼidia ta Ieisu ena viaqa waiwaina tauna ʼinaya weaqina simanayea, e tomotau qabudi inoqolia ʼinega nuadi voqana.
41005021	Ta Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo ivaukamana ʼevivi lavu Galili diʼwenaya. Omoʼe ʼinaya qabu qiduadi ivaʼauta balabalaya ta Ieisu itoa vivilia.
41005022	ʼInega taha ʼoloto ana wawa Yailo, tauna vanue tafwalolo ana tovanugweta, mai Ieisu ʼinaya ta ʼiawanaya iwaʼodu,
41005023	ta noqinoqi waiwai vonaya, “Kaiwabu, natugu mevavinena goyona nawale yawaina nagumwala, ʼinega nuanuagu una mai ta nimauyega una gitonovia ʼinega naveaqiaqi be mayawaina natoatoa.”
41005024	ʼInega Ieisu yaʼitoto ta toluvine~nana maega itutuvila itauya, ta tomotau qabudi iʼabiʼabibodea ta ivevetunuefala ʼedaya.
41005025	Ta qabu diavona gamodia taha vavine ma ana vihiqa sulalina inoinoqa yaʼwala tuwelo ʼidia, ta nawale inoinoqa ge daluaʼu.
41005026	Tuta qabuna tauya togweli qabudi ʼidia, ta ena kulufa ʼidia vegumwalia ta ge daveaqiaqi, ta ʼesi ana vihiqa veʼenaʼi.
41005027	-
41005028	Tutana vavine~nana Ieisu valena noqolia qabu maega itautauya, ʼinega vavine~nana Ieisu ʼabibodanega maimai ta ena nuanua gamonaya vonaya, “ʼEguma Ieisu ana kwakwalufai ena gitonoviamo ʼinega ena veaqiaqi.” ʼInega mai Ieisu gwavunaya ta ana kwakwalufai gitonovia.
41005029	Ta tuta~nana gitonovia ʼinega sulalina yafaha kwayavonia ta lutonovia niʼa veaqiaqi.
41005030	Niʼau Ieisu lutonovia ena waiwai ʼifoqe, ʼinega tunugivila vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Togama gitonovigu?”
41005031	ʼInega ana toʼabibodayavo ivonaya, “Kaiwabu, tolaʼai weaqina uvetalaʼai togama au kaleko gitonovi, ta ge uda ʼitedi tomotau qabudi ivatafutafufuda.”
41005032	Ta Ieisu nawale ʼita givigivila tomotau nuanidia nuanuana naʼitea togama gitonovi.
41005033	Ta vavine~nana niʼa alamania tolaʼai ʼifoqe ʼinaya, ʼinega mai Ieisu ʼinaya ta ʼaqenaya iwaʼodu. Ta me ena mwaniniva tatava, ta yani qabuna weaqina simana aqiaqiea ʼinaya.
41005034	Ta Ieisu vonaya, “Natugu, eu vetumaqana ʼinega niʼa uveaqiaqi. Uyaʼitoto, ge una nuanua mana au vihiqa niʼa awala.”
41005035	Ieisu nawale vonavona, ʼinega Yailo tauna vanue tafwalolo ana tovanugweta ena vanuega vaina tomotau iʼifoqe imai ta ivoneaya, “Natuhu yawaina niʼa gumwala, ʼinega Toveʼita ge una veʼaqe visiqi.”
41005036	Ta Ieisu wese valena noqolia ta Yailo vonea vonaya, “Ge giwaliu nahaʼala, ta ʼesi una vetumaqanamo.”
41005037	ʼInega Ieisu qabu awatayedi ge ina talaʼobei, ta toʼabiboda toidi maega itautauya, taudi Fita be Iemesa ma taina Ioni.
41005038	Itautauya ta Yailo ena vanuea iʼifoqe ʼinega toʼewabamu be wese todou bonadi ʼenaʼina inoqolia.
41005039	ʼInega Ieisu lugu e vonedia, “Tolaʼai weaqina odoudou ta ovevekolukolua? Gwama baʼe ge daʼaliga ta ʼesi ʼeno motaiva ʼenoʼeno.”
41005040	Ta todou Ieisu idagiea. ʼInega Ieisu ʼwavinidi iʼifoqe, ta gwama tamana be inana ta wese ana toʼabibodayavo toidi Ieisu maega ilugu gwama ana ʼivia.
41005041	Ta Ieisu gwama nimanaya kafi e vonaya, “Talita koum!” (Ana alamani “Iodi uyaʼitoto!”)
41005042	Baʼe gwama~nana niʼau yaʼwala tuwelo lobea. Ta tuta~nana Ieisu divanoya ʼinega lukwayavonega tovolo ta yaba dadana. Tamana be inana ta wese ana toʼabibodayavo nuadi voqana aqiaqi.
41005043	ʼInega Ieisu awatayedi vonaya, “Ge taha toga ʼinaya ona simanayegu egu viaqa baʼe weaqina, ta ana ʼabwaga ona neia naʼai.”
41006001	Ieisu Yailo ena vanue nogea, ʼinega ma ana toʼabibodayavo itauya ena ʼabagaya.
41006002	Omoʼe ʼinaya itoatoa ta ʼaubena Sabate ʼifoqe. ʼInega lugu vanue tafwaloloya ta veʼale veʼita, e tomotau qabudi inoqolia nuadi voqana, ʼinega ivonaya, “ʼOloto baʼe, toʼedega ena alamani lobei ta wese ena viaqa waiwaidi ʼebenuavoqana tolaʼaiega ʼewei?”
41006003	Ta wese ivonaya, “ʼOloto baʼe, tauna toʼeyoqona, waisa? Ta inana Meli be tainavo Iemesa be Iosefa be Iudasa ta wese Saimoni. Ta wese novunavo maega katoatoa, waisa?” ʼInega tomotau Ieisu inogea.
41006004	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Tovesimasimanayavo adi ʼamayaba ilobelobea mali ʼabagega, ta edi ʼabagayavo ta wese edi gadeavo ʼidiega ge taha ʼamayaba ida lobea.”
41006005	-
41006006	Ta Ieisu nuana voqana mana tomotau ge ida vetumaqanea. ʼInega ge ana fata viaqa ʼebenuavoqana ʼeala daviaqidi, ta tovevihiqa ʼevisa dimo gitonovidi ta giveaqiaqiedi. ʼInega Ieisu luvivila ʼabaga taha taha ʼidia ta veveʼita.
41006007	Ieisu Tuwelo~dina gaba vaʼauqidi, ʼinega lualua vetunedi ina luvivila ʼabaga taha taha ʼidia. Ta ena luvine be wese ena waiwai neidi, ʼinega adi fata niboana luveifadi tomotau ʼidiega ina ʼwavi ʼifoqeyedi.
41006008	-
41006009	ʼInega Ieisu luʼaqetutudi vonaya, “Ge taha tolaʼai ona ʼewei emi luvivila weaqina. Ge ʼabwaga, ge kode, ge ami kaleko vemagilafuna, ta wese ge mane. Ta emi kewala namo nimamia ta wese ami ʼaqeyafayafa ona veʼaqe.”
41006010	ʼInega wese vonedi vonaya, “ʼEguma ina gabemi taha vanue ʼinaya ona lugu, e ʼinega vanue nana ʼinaya ona toatoa ana laba ʼabaga~nana ona nogea.
41006011	Ta ʼeguma ʼabaga vaina ʼinaya ona ʼifoqe ta totoa ʼabaga ge ina ʼebeʼewemi ina tauyemi edi vanuea, ta wese ʼeguma ge nuanuadi ina vineneqemi, e ʼinega ʼaqemiega fwayafwaya ona vavutuvutuqia, ta ona nogedi. Baʼe ʼinega ona veʼitedi nawale vita naʼifoqe ʼidia.”
41006012	ʼInega ana toʼabibodayavo iluvivila ʼabaga qabudi ʼidia ta tomotau ilugaihidi be edi ilivu luveifana ina nogedi ta ina nuagivila.
41006013	Ta niboana luveifadi ʼeala tomotau ʼidiega iʼwavi ʼifoqeyedi, ta wese tovevihiqa qabudi dedeʼwega ʼwafidi iʼeʼabiʼabia ta iveaqiaqi.
41006014	Vonahaqiaqi, lova Elodi taunega luvine aʼuya ta Ioni ikafia iaʼuluguyea vanue ʼebeyoqona ʼinaya. Ta Ioni ana kafi ʼiuna taha vavine adi wawa Elodiasa. Taudi Elodi tuana Filifi moqanena, ta Elodi luabuyedi ta vaqidi.
41006015	ʼInega Ioni Elodi vonea vonaya, “Benaʼe ilivu ge aqiaqina, mana tuau moqanena uvaqidi, ʼinega luvine ubwegea.”
41006016	Ta Ioni ena lugaihi ʼinega vavine dina diadi vilea nuanuadi ina luveʼaligia. Ta ge adi fata,
41006017	mana Elodi Ioni ʼamayabea ena ilivu gwalagwalana be tunutunuqina weaqina. Ta wese alamania tauna Yaubada ena tofewa taha. ʼInega Elodi Ioni tufwana mwaninivea ta vabodebodea. Elodi nuanuana Ioni ena lugaihi nanoqolia, ta weaqina giwalina aʼala.
41006018	ʼInega Elodi ena ʼaubena viʼoi ana nuaveʼavina ʼifoqe. Ta Elodiasa ʼaubenana ʼinaya ʼeda niʼau inuaʼeqaʼuya maʼoda ʼinega Ioni ina luveʼaligi. Ta ʼaubena nana weaqina ʼabwaga ʼenaʼina iʼivaʼavaʼaia. ʼInega Elodi ena tomotauyavo ʼidewani toluvineavo be toluavia adi tovamatanayavo ta wese Galili ʼabaganavo ana kaiwabuyavo gabedi imai.
41006019	Tuta nana Elodi totoa vaʼauta maega iʼaiʼai, ʼinega Elodiasa natudi mevavinena lugu mai matadia tovolo, ta ouyega gigiveqaiawedi. ʼInega Elodi iahaba nana vonea vonaya, “ʼEguma taha yani nuanuau ta weaqina una noqiegu, e ena neiu.”
41006020	ʼInega vona fofofola ta wese Tamada ʼinanea vonaya, “Vonahaqiaqi, tolaʼai weaqina una noqi ʼiguya ena neiu, ta wese ana fata egu ʼebeluvine diʼwena ena daʼei ena neiu!”
41006021	ʼInega iahaba nana ʼifoqe tauya inana ʼidia ta vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Inagu, toyani weaqina ena noqi Elodi ʼinaya?” Ta inana ivonaya, “Elodi una voneaya, ‘Nuanuagu Ioni Togivebabitaiso ʼunuʼununa una neigu.’”
41006022	ʼInega iahabana lukwayavoni ʼevivi Elodi ʼinaya ta vonaya, “Nuanuagu baʼitaga Ioni Togivebabitaiso ʼunuʼununa gaeba ʼinaya una dodoi una neigu.”
41006023	ʼInega Elodi nuana vita aqiaqi ta ge ana fata nanoga mana niʼau Tamada ʼinanea totoa vaʼauta matadia.
41006024	ʼInega Elodi toluavia taha luvetunei natauya vanue ʼebeyoqona ʼinaya, ta luvine neia be Ioni ʼunuʼununa namiea. ʼInega ʼoloto nana tauya ta Ioni magana daʼea,
41006025	ta ʼunuʼununa gaebaya dodoi ta ʼavalei miea ʼabo iahaba nana neia. ʼEwei tauya ta inana neidi.
41006026	Ta Ioni ana toʼabibodayavo ena ʼaliga valena inoqolia, ʼinega imai ta Ioni ʼwafina iʼewei e itavunia.
41006027	Ta Ieisu ena viaqa waiwaidi valena tomotau iyavula dadanea diʼwe qabuna ʼidia, ta Elodi wese vale nana noqolia. Ta vaina tomotau ivonaya, “Ioni Togivebabitaiso ʼaligega niʼa yaʼitoto ʼevivi, ta baʼe ʼinega ana fata yani diavona ʼebenua voqana wese viaviaqidi.”
41006028	Ta vaina ivonaya, “Tauna Ilaitia.” Ta wese vaina tomotau ivonaya, “Tauna tovesimasimana taha kavona lova tovesimasimana nugwenugweidi ʼidewana.”
41006029	Ta tuta nana Elodi mali vona be mali vona tomotau ʼidiega noqolia ʼinega vonaya, “Lova Ioni Togivebabitaiso yaluveʼaligia, ta niʼa ʼaligega yaʼitoto ʼevivi.”
41006030	Tovaletuyana dina niʼau iʼevivi mai Ieisu ʼinaya ta itoa vivilia. ʼInega edi fewa be wese edi veʼita weaqina isimana ʼinaya.
41006031	Ta tomotau qabudi tuta qabuna imaimai ʼeviʼevivi. ʼInega Ieisu me ena tovaletuyanayavo ge adi fata ida veyawai ta ida ʼai. ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Omai ʼiguya, be kana tauya diʼwe taha tomotau geqana ʼinaya, ta omoʼe ʼinaya ada ʼaidega kana veyawai.”
41006032	ʼInega taha waga ʼinaya igelu sabi tauya diʼwe tomotau geqana ʼinaya.
41006033	Ta tuta nana italatete malavetaya tomotau ʼeala iʼita ʼinanedi. ʼInega qabudi ta wese ʼabaga taha taha ʼidiega tomotau ʼaqediega ivihilamo imaduʼifoqe.
41006034	Tuta nana Ieisu wagega vawebui balabalaya ʼinega qabu qidua vaʼinedi ʼita nuaduyedi, mana taudi kavona sifi luluveʼwaividi ge adi toʼitamakimo. Ta ʼinega veʼale veʼitedi yani ʼeala weaqidi.
41006035	Ta niʼa lulaviea ʼinega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo imai ivoneaya, “Kaiwabu, diʼwe baʼena tomotau geqana ta babaʼau niʼau lialia ʼunuva.
41006036	ʼInega tomotau qabudi una vetunedi ina ʼevivi ina tauya ʼabaga vaina diʼwedaya, ta taudiega adi ʼabwaga ina sali ta ina gimwane.”
41006037	ʼInega Ieisu vona ʼeviviedi vonaya, “Omiʼa ʼabwaga ona neidi ina ʼai!” ʼInega Ieisu iveʼiea ivonaya, “Ge ama fata tomotau qabudi adi ʼabwaga ana gimwanei, mana ana veʼia qidua vaʼinena. Ta ʼesi ʼeguma mane qiduana ʼimaya daʼenoʼeno kavona ʼoloto adi yau 8 edi fewa waiʼena ʼaidegana weaqina ana veʼia, e ʼinega baʼe tobotana dina adi ʼabwaga ama fata ada gimwanea.”
41006038	ʼInega Ieisu vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Beledi ʼevisa ʼimia? Otauya oʼeloʼita.” Ta niʼa ilobea ʼinega ivoneaya, “Beledi nima ʼaidegana ta wese ʼiqana magilafudi.”
41006039	ʼInega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo vonedi tomotau qabudi ina luvinedi be ina toabui libia guguna ʼinega.
41006040	Ta vaina guguna itoavaʼauta ʼidewana 100, ta vaina 50.
41006041	ʼInega Ieisu beledi nima ʼaidegana ta ʼiqana magilafudi ʼewedi ta ʼita vane mahalaya ʼinega lukaiwa ta beledi gitomwedi. ʼInega ana toʼabibodayavo neidi, ta ivewilaʼayea ma ʼiqanina tomotau qabudi ʼidia.
41006042	ʼInega qabudi iʼai ta gamodi ʼelukoko.
41006043	Ta toʼabiboda dina beledi be ʼiqana ʼawagigidi ivaʼauqidi ta ʼonena adi yau tuwelo iluveagatunaʼidi.
41006044	Ta toʼai diavona ʼidiega ʼoloto dimo adi yau 5,000 ʼidewani.
41006045	Ta ge tuta kuena ʼabibodanaya Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo lubibinedi vonaya, “Wagaya ona gelu be ona nugweta ona vaukamana mali diʼwea Bedesaida ʼinaya. Ta yaʼa tomotau qabudi ena vematamagilafuyedi be ina veʼiyavula edi ʼabagayavo ʼidia.”
41006046	ʼInega igelu ta Ieisu qabu diavona luvetunedi iyavula, ta ʼabiboda ʼwatovu bwanagaya sabi venoqi.
41006047	Ta niʼa velovanea ʼinega ana toʼabibodayavo nawale lavu malavetanaya wagaya itautauya, ta tauna ana ʼaidega nawale oade bwanagaya toatoa.
41006048	ʼInega Ieisu ʼitedi inevaneva ta ge adi fata ina vihila, mana yaqina ʼauʼiaʼiawedi. ʼInega manu ʼaʼalaya Ieisu lavu debanega maimai ʼidia tuta goyona nanogedi.
41006049	Ta tuta nana Ieisu iʼitea ʼinega ivonaya be otala. ʼInega imwaniniva ta idiula,
41006050	ta Ieisu lukwayavoni vonedia, “ʼElovemi, yaʼa baʼe taugu emi Kaiwabu, ʼinega ge ona mwaniniva!”
41006051	ʼInega Ieisu wagaya gelu ʼabo yaqina luaʼu. Ta toʼabiboda dina nuadi voqana qiduana,
41006052	mana nawale nuadi ge daʼeqaʼuya Ieisu ena fewa waiwaina weaqina tuta nana tomotau qabudi veʼainidi beledi nima ʼaidegana ʼinega, mana edi vetumaqana goyona ta wese debadi ʼiʼwanina.
41006053	ʼInega ivaukamana lavu diʼwenaya ʼabaga Genasaleta ʼinaya, ta waga iluifwea.
41006054	Ta tutana ivawebui totoa ʼabaga Ieisu iʼinanea.
41006055	ʼInega tomotau diavona ivihila itauya ʼabaga qabuna ʼidia, ta Ieisu Valena isimanayea tomotau ʼidia maʼinaya toatoa. ʼInega tovevihiqa qabudi ma ʼividi iʼavaledi itauyedi Ieisu ʼinaya.
41006056	Ta Ieisu luvivila diʼwe taha taha ʼidia, ʼabaga qiduqiduadi be ʼabaga goyogoyodi, ta wese vaoqaya. Ta tovevihiqayavo imiedi ʼebetoavaʼauta ʼidia, ta ivenoqi ʼinaya ʼeguma ana fata ana kwakwalufai matavusinamo ida gitonovia. ʼInega Ieisu awafela ʼidia, ta aiqabu igitonovia e iveaqiaqi.
41007001	ʼAbiboda Falisiavo ta wese luvine ana toveʼitayavo maega imai Ielusalemega, ta Ieisu ʼinaya ivaʼauta itoa vivilia.
41007002	Ta Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo iʼitedi iʼaiʼai, ʼinega diadi vilea mana nimadi ge ida ʼutudi.
41007003	(Falisiavo ta wese me Diu qabudi tubudiavo edi ilivu ikafikafia. ʼInega ge taha toga ana fata naʼai ʼeguma nimana ge ana ʼutumo.
41007004	Ta ʼeguma ʼabaga ʼebegimwane ʼinega ina mai, e nugweta ina uweta ʼinega ina ʼai. Ta wese luvine qabuna tubudiavo ʼidiega gaeba be vedi be wese ʼulena adi ʼutu weaqina iʼabiʼabibodedi.)
41007005	ʼInega Falisiavo be luvine ana toveʼitayavo Ieisu ivetalaʼaiea ivonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina au toʼabibodayavo tubudavo edi ilivu ge ida ʼamayabedi, mana nimadi bwavubwavuna ta iʼaiʼai?”
41007006	ʼInega Ieisu vona ʼeviviedi vonaya, “Omiʼa tovemeahaqila! Lova tovesimasimana Aisea weaqimi maduvona fofofolayea tuta~nana Yaubada ena vona ʼwayavia, ta baʼe ʼidewana vonaya, ‘Tomotau baʼe ʼawadiega iʼamayabegu, ta giwalidiega itoa luluvai ʼiguyega.
41007007	Ta wese ʼiguya ihiwaiwaʼodu kavokavovo, mana edi veʼita luvineavo weaqina tomotau edi nuenuega, ta ge yaʼa ʼiguyega.’”
41007008	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Vonahaqiaqi, omiʼa Yaubada ena luvineavo ge oda ʼabibodedi, mana tubumiavo edi ilivu nawale okafiʼiʼihia.”
41007009	Ta wese vonedi vonaya, “Vonigo onuaia omiʼa toalamani aqiaqi, ta gebu! Mana Yaubada ena luvineavo onogenogedi, ta ʼesi tubumiavo edi ilivu oʼabiʼabibodedi.
41007010	Lova Mosese Yaubada ena luvine simanea vonaya, ‘Tamau wese inau una ʼamayabedi.’ Ta wese vonaya, ‘ʼEguma togama tamana wese inana navona veʼalatedi e luaqiaqiea be naʼaliga.’
41007011	Ta omiʼa ovonaya vonigo taha toga tamana be inana ana fata navonedi navonaya, ‘Soli qiduana, yaʼa egu kulufayavo niʼau yahawafeledi Yaubada ʼinaya, ʼinega ge agu fata ena iulemi.’
41007012	Ta baʼe vona~nana ʼinega tomotau adi iula tamadiavo be inadiavo ʼidia oawahawatayedi.
41007013	Yavona aqiaqiemi, tubumiavo edi ilivu baʼe ʼinega ta wese emi veʼita qabudi ʼidiega Yaubada ena vona olukavokavovoyea.”
41007014	ʼInega wese Ieisu tomotau qabudi gabedi imai ʼinega vonedi vonaya, “Qabumi egu vona baʼe ona noqolia ta ona nuaʼeqaʼuya!
41007015	Tolaʼai kaʼaiʼainia ge ana fata nagivebwavuda. Ta ʼesi tolaʼai ʼawadega ʼifoʼifoqe mai e ana fata nagivebwavuda.”
41007016	[“ʼEguma ma teniqami vona baʼe ona noqolia!”]
41007017	ʼInega Ieisu qabu qiduadi nogedi ta ma ana toʼabibodayavo ilugu taha vanue ʼinaya, e ʼinega ivetalaʼaiea ena vona~nana tomotau ʼidia ana alamani weaqina.
41007018	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Nage omiʼa wese nuami nawale ge daʼeqaʼuya? Ta ona alamani aqiaqiea tolaʼai kaʼaiʼainia lugulugu gamodaya ge ana fata nagivebwavuda.
41007019	Mana ʼabwaga ge dalugulugu giwalidaya, ta ʼesi tautauya gamodaya, ʼinega ʼabiboda tautauya avuqainaya.” (Ena veʼita baʼe ʼinega Ieisu givesimatalia ʼidia ʼabwaga qabuna vunavunaqidi.)
41007020	Ta Ieisu wese vonedi vonaya, “Tolaʼai ʼifoʼifoqe tomotau eda nuenuega e ana fata nagivebwavuda,
41007021	ʼedewani nuanua luveifadi be, velamoʼeno kavokavovo be, vanawala be, luveʼaliga be,
41007022	luabu be, vemanuguba be, nuanua kavokavovo be, vediavilavila be, uʼava be, veʼifiʼifi be, vemwakoloai be, gagasa be, vegila ta wese vaina ilivu kavokavovo.
41007023	Baʼe ilivu diavona luveifadi iʼifoʼifoqe tomotau edi nuenuega ta gigivebwavudi Yaubada matanaya.”
41007024	ʼInega Ieisu diʼwe Galili nogea ta tauya Taia ʼabaganavo ʼidia. Ta taha vanue ʼinaya lugu, mana ge nuanuana taha toga ena mai weaqina nahalamania. Ta ge ana fata naoukwaiva mana valena tomotau niʼa inoqolia.
41007025	-
41007026	ʼInega wese taha vavine Ieisu ena mai valena inoqolia. Taudi ge Diu vavinedi, ta lova iviʼoi ʼabaga Finisia ʼinaya diʼwe Silia gamonaya. Ta natudi goyona mevavinena niboana luveifana niʼa ʼwahalia, ʼinega inana imai Ieisu ʼinaya ta ʼaqenaya igivelukabwebwe. Ta ivenoqiea niboana luveifana naʼwavi ʼifoqeyea natudi ʼinega.
41007027	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Nugweta egu tomotauyavo me Diu ena iuledi. Ta ge daluaqiaqiea be gogama adi ʼabwaga ena ʼewei ʼidiega ena felei kedewa ʼidia ta ina ʼaini.”
41007028	ʼInega vavine~dina ivona ʼeviviea ivonaya, “Kaiwabu vonahaqiaqi, ta kedewa tuta qabuna ʼebeʼai ʼayanaya gogama adi ʼabwaga salimuguna ʼinega iʼaiʼai.”
41007029	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Emi vona vonahaqiaqi, ʼinega ona ʼevivi ona tauya ta niboana luveifana natumi ʼinega niʼa ʼifoqe ta veaqiaqi.”
41007030	ʼInega iyaʼitoto itauya edi vanuea ta natudi iʼitea ʼivia ʼenoʼeno. Ta niboana luveifana niʼa dena tauya.
41007031	ʼInega Ieisu Taia nogea ta tauya Saidoni ʼinaya, ʼinega ʼevivi tauya lavu Galili ta vaukamana diʼwe Dikafoli ʼabaganavo ʼidia.
41007032	ʼInega vaina tomotau taha ʼoloto imiea Ieisu ʼinaya. Ta ʼolotona teniqana kwavana ta wese ge ana fata navona. ʼInega Ieisu ivenoqiea be nagitonovia.
41007033	Ta Ieisu tovenakunakuna qabu ʼidiega ʼebeʼewei ta magilafudi ivaduma adi ʼaidega. ʼInega Ieisu nimanoyana ʼoloto~nana teniqanaya aʼuluguyea. E ʼabiboda wese nimana gidaʼwei ta tovenakunaku~nana meana gitonovia.
41007034	Gumwala, ʼinega Ieisu ʼita vane mahalaya yawaina lihia ta vonaya, “Efata!” (Ta vona~nana ana givila “ʼEqaʼuhu!”)
41007035	Ta tuta~nana ʼinaya ʼoloto~nana teniqana ʼeqaʼuya ta noqola aqiaqi, ta wese meana niʼa tunuqa be ana fata naveqae.
41007036	ʼInega Ieisu tomotau qabudi awatayedi ge taha toga navevonavonayei. Ta awataya~nana inoqolia ta ge ida ʼabibodei, ʼinega ivesimasimana dadanea tomotau ʼidia.
41007037	Ta tomotau qabudi nuadi voqana aqiaqi, ʼinega ivonaya, “Ieisu ena viaqayavo aqiaqi otaqidi ta ʼebenuavoqana, mana teniqadi kwavana vona inoqonoqolia, ta wese taudi ge adi fata ina veqae meadi giveaqiaqiedi ʼinega iveveqae.”
41008001	Tuta omoʼe ʼinaya wese taha qabu qiduadi ivaʼauta Ieisu ʼinaya, ta ge adi ʼabwagamo. ʼInega ana toʼabibodayavo gabedi imai ta vonedi vonaya,
41008002	“Tomotau baʼena yanuakolokoloyedi, mana ʼaubena toi baʼidia maega katoatoa, ta adi ʼabwaga niʼau gumwala.
41008003	ʼInega ʼeguma ma botanidi ena vetunedi ina ʼevivi nawale ʼedaya ina tafefwai, mana vaina ʼidiega luluvaiega imai.”
41008004	Ta ana toʼabibodayavo ivonea ivonaya, “Diʼwe baʼena tomotau geqana ta maʼoda qabu qiduana baʼe adi ʼabwaga kana loba ʼaiqei?”
41008005	ʼInega Ieisu vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “ʼEvisa ami beledi ʼenoʼeno?” Ta ivoneaya, “Ana yau seveni.”
41008006	ʼInega Ieisu qabu luvinedi be bwaʼobwaʼoya itoabui. ʼInega beledi seveni~dina ʼewedi vona lukaiwa Yaubada ʼinaya. ʼInega gitomwedi ta ana toʼabibodayavo neidi ta ivewilaʼayedi qabu ʼidia.
41008007	Ta wese vaina ʼiqana goyogoyodi iʼenoʼeno, ʼinega ʼewedi be weaqidi vona lukaiwa ta ana toʼabibodayavo neidi, e ʼinega ivewilaʼayedi tomotau qabudi ʼidia.
41008008	ʼInega qabu diavona iʼai ta gamodi ʼelukoko. Ta ʼabiboda toʼabiboda~dina ʼabwaga ʼawagigidi ivaʼauqia e ʼonena adi yau seveni iluveagatunaʼidi.
41008009	Ta toʼai diavona ʼidiega ʼoloto dimo adi yau ʼidewani 4,000. ʼInega Ieisu qabu vetune ʼeviviedi itauya,
41008010	ta ma ana toʼabibodayavo taha waga igeluya, ta itauya diʼwe Dalamanuta ʼinaya.
41008011	ʼInega Falisi imai Ieisu ʼinaya maega iveʼaeʼaetoga ta nuanuadi ina sitonovia. ʼInega iluvetuvetunea vonigo taha ʼebeʼita naviaqia ʼidia ina ʼitea ʼinega ina alamania Yaubada ʼinega ena waiwai ʼifoqe.
41008012	ʼInega Ieisu nuana vita vonedi vonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina lagata omiʼa baʼe nuanuami ʼebeʼita taha ena viaqi ʼimia? Yavona aqiaqiemi, ge taha ʼebeʼita ena neimi ona ʼitei.”
41008013	ʼInega nogedi ta wagaya gelu ʼevivi, e ma ana toʼabibodayavo italatalaukamana lavu mali diʼwenaya.
41008014	Ta Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo adi ʼabwaga ge ida ʼewei mana nuadi fani, ta beledi ʼaideganamo waga gamonaya ʼenoʼeno.
41008015	ʼInega Ieisu vona sesebaiega vematamagilafu waiwaina neidi vonaya, “Falisiavo be Elodi adi beledi ana ʼebegiveago isiti ʼinega ona ʼitamakimi!”
41008016	ʼInega toʼabiboda~dina taudiega iveqae ivonaya, “Nage Ieisu baʼe ʼidewani vona ʼaiqa, mana ada beledi kanuafania?”
41008017	Ta Ieisu edi nuagovaqa niʼa alamania ʼinega vonedi vonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina taumiega oveveqae vonigo ge ami beledimo? Beledi weaqina yaʼa ge eda vonavona. Nage nawale nuami ge dasimatala, waisa?
41008018	Omiʼa ma matami ta ge oda ʼitaʼita, ta wese ma teniqami ta ge oda noqonoqoli! Nage niʼa ovenuafania egu viaqayavo tuta~nana qabu qiduadi beledi ʼinega yaveʼainidi, waisa?
41008019	Taha tuta ʼinaya beledi nima ʼaidegina ʼinega tomotau 5,000 yaveʼainidi, ta ʼawagigidi ʼonena ʼevisa oluveagatunaʼidi?” ʼInega ivoneaya, “Tuwelo.”
41008020	Ta wese Ieisu vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Ta wese taha tuta ʼinaya beledi seveni ʼinega tomotau 4,000 yaveʼainidi, ta ʼawagigidi ʼonena ʼevisa oluveagatunaʼidi?” Ta ivoneaya, “Ana yau seveni.”
41008021	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Vonahaqiaqi, omiʼa nuami nawale ge daʼeqaʼuya, waisa?”
41008022	Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo imai ilugu Bedesaida ʼinaya. ʼInega vaina tomotau taha ʼoloto matana kwayakwayana iʼebeʼewei imiea Ieisu ʼinaya, ta inoqiea vonigo dagitonovia.
41008023	Ta Ieisu matakwaya~nana nimanaya kafi ʼinega iʼifoqe itauya ʼabaga nanavinaya. ʼInega Ieisu ʼoloto~nana matana gidaʼwea ta nimanega matana gitonovia, e ʼinega voneaya, “Au fata una ʼita nage gebu?”
41008024	ʼInega ʼoloto~nana ʼita givigivila ta vonaya, “Tomotau yaʼitedi iyabayaba ta adi ʼita kavona ʼaiwe.”
41008025	ʼInega Ieisu ʼoloto~nana matana gitonova ʼeviviea, ta ʼinega matana ʼeaea ta yani qabuna ʼita aqiaqiedi.
41008026	ʼInega Ieisu voneaya, “Una tauya eu vanuea, ta tauya~nana ʼinaya ge wese una lugu ʼabaga gamonega!”
41008027	Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo iluvivila Sisalia Filifai ʼabaganavo ʼidia. Ta ʼedaya vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Maʼoda tomotau edi vona weaqigu vonigo yaʼa toga?”
41008028	ʼInega toʼabiboda~dina ivoneaya, “Tomotau vaina ivonaya oʼa Ioni Togivebabitaiso. Ta vaina ivonaya oʼa Ilaitia. Ta wese vaina ivonaya oʼa tovesimasimana nugwenugweidi taha ʼidiega.”
41008029	ʼInega wese Ieisu vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Ta omiʼa maʼoda emi nuanua vonigo yaʼa toga?” ʼInega Fita vona ʼeviviea vonaya, “Oʼa Keliso Toʼetoyavua.”
41008030	ʼInega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo luvine waiwaina neidi vonedi vonaya, “Ge taha tomeqabu ʼidia ona vevonavonayegu!”
41008031	ʼInega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo veʼale veʼitedi vonedia, “Yaʼa Tomotau Natuna nawale visiqa agona ena lobea. Mana nawale ʼabaga ana tovanugwetayavo be toveguba qiduqiduadi ta wese luvine ana toveʼitayavo ina veʼineiegu toluvine ʼidia be ina luveʼaligigu. Ta ʼaubena toi ʼabibodanaya ena yaʼitoto ʼevivi.”
41008032	Ieisu ena vona baʼe ʼinega simana ʼifoqe aqiaqiea ena ʼaliga weaqina. ʼInega Fita Ieisu ʼebeʼewei maega ivanaqo tufinaya ta awatayea vonaya, “Ieisu, baʼe yani diavona ge wese naʼifoqe ʼiuya.”
41008033	ʼInega Ieisu tunugivila ta ana toʼabibodayavo ʼitedi, ta Ieisu Fita lugwaeyea voneaya, “Oʼa ʼidewani Seitani, ʼinega unogegu! Eu nuanua kavona tomotau edi nuanua, ta ge Yaubada ena nuanua ʼidewani.”
41008034	ʼInega Ieisu tomotau qabudi wese ana toʼabibodayavo maega gabedi imai e vonedi vonaya, “ʼEguma taha toga nuanuana be naʼabibodegu, luaqiaqiea tauna ena nuanua nanogedi ʼinega taunega ana ʼetoluai naʼavalea ta naʼabibodegu.
41008035	ʼInega togama yawaina navegagalea e nawale yawaina naluveʼwaivia, ta togama yawaina nahawafelea weaqigu ta wese Valegu weaqina nawale yawai aqiaqina nalobea.
41008036	ʼEguma taha toga bwaʼobwaʼo ana kulufa kaikaiwabuna qabudi naʼewedi ta ʼabiboda naʼaliga, tolaʼai ana aqiaqina? Gebuʼe otaqa!
41008037	Mana ge taha toga ana fata taha yani ʼinega yawaina naʼewa ʼeviviei.
41008038	Baʼitagana ana tomotauyavo Yaubada ilugwavuʼaiea ta wese ilivu luveifana tuta qabuna iviaviaqidi. ʼInega ʼeguma taha toga weaqigu ta wese egu veʼita weaqina nainiyauyau ta navegeqegu tomotau matadia, e nawale yaʼa Tomotau Natuna wese tomotau~nana ena vegeqea tuta~nana Tamagu ena simatala aqiaqi otaqina ʼinega ena ʼevivi ena mai Yaubada ena tovaleʼewa gwalagwaladi maega.”
41009001	Ta Ieisu wese vonedi vonaya, “Yavona aqiaqi ʼimia, tomotau vaimi ge ona ʼaliga ana laba Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine me ena waiwai naveʼifoqeyea ona ʼitea.”
41009002	ʼInega ʼaubena sikisi ʼabibodanaya Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo toidi Fita be Iemesa ma taina Ioni ʼebeʼewedi e maega iʼwatovu bwanaga taha kuena ʼinaya, ta adi ʼaidega itoatoa. ʼInega Ieisu matadia ana ʼita vedumaduma.
41009003	Ta ana kaleko luwadawadaea otaqia. Ge taha toga bwaʼobwaʼoya ana fata kaleko naʼutui be naluwadaeyei ʼidewana.
41009004	ʼInega Ilaitia be Mosese iʼifoqe ta Ieisu maega iveveqae.
41009005	ʼInega Fita Ieisu voneaya, “Toveʼita, eda toa baʼidia aqiaqi otaqina, ana ʼita didi toi kana viaqia. Taha oʼa weaqiu, ta taha Mosese weaqina ta wese taha Ilaitia weaqina.”
41009006	(Fita baʼe ʼidewani vona ʼaiqa, mana ma enavo imwaniniva, ʼinega ge dahalamania tolaʼai navonayei.)
41009007	ʼInega gawata ʼifoqe ʼafwalidi ta taha vona gawatega ʼifoqe vonaya, “Baʼe Natugu, tauna yaveyolubea. Tauna ena vonayavo ona noqolia!”
41009008	ʼInega lukwayavonega iʼita givigivila ta ge taha toga ida ʼitei, ta ʼesi Ieisu ana ʼaidega maega itoatoa.
41009009	Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo bwanagega iwebuwebui mai ʼinega luvine neidi vonedia, “Ge taha toga ona vonevonei tolaʼai niʼa oʼitea bwanagaya weaqina, ana laba yaʼa Tomotau Natuna ʼaligega ena yaʼitoto ʼevivi.”
41009010	ʼInega vona~nana iaʼukwaivea, ta taudimo iveqae Ieisu ena yaʼitoto ʼevivi ʼaligega ana alamani weaqina.
41009011	ʼInega Ieisu ivetalaʼaiea ivonaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina luvine ana toveʼitayavo ivonavona vonigo Ilaitia namadumai ta ʼabiboda Toʼetoyavua namai?”
41009012	ʼInega Ieisu vona ʼeviviedi vonaya, “E ʼidewana, Ilaitia nanugweta namai ta yani qabuna nagivetunuqidi. Ta tolaʼai weaqina Buki Nugwenugweina ʼinaya iʼwayavia vonigo Tomotau Natuna visiqa qiduana nalobei ta tomotau ina veilivu veifea?
41009013	Ta yavonevonemi, Ilaitia niʼa mai ta tomotau edi nuenuega iveilivu kavokavovo ʼinaya, ʼidewana Buki Nugwenugweina madusimanea tauna weaqina.”
41009014	Ieisu ana toʼabiboda toidi maega bwanagega niʼa iwebui mai dumiʼaya, ʼinega qabu qiduana ʼitedi ana toʼabibodayavo itoa vivilidi, ta luvine ana toveʼitayavo maega iveveʼaeʼaetoga.
41009015	Ta tuta~nana qabu diavona Ieisu iʼitea ʼinega me edi qaiawa ivihila ʼinaya sabi ʼebeʼewana.
41009016	ʼInega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo vetalaʼaiedi vonedia, “Toyani weaqina luvine ana toveʼitayavo maega oveveʼaeʼaetoga?”
41009017	ʼInega ʼoloto taha qabu diavona ʼidiega veʼia voneaya, “Toveʼita, edi veʼaeʼaetoga ʼiuna natugu meʼolotona weaqina, mana niboana luveifana niʼa ʼwahalia ʼinega ge ana fata navona.
41009018	Ta tuta qabuna tafetafefwai ta niboana~nana vevekaoya. Ta ʼawanega fulofulo ʼifoʼifoqe be alana kikokiko ta wese ʼwafina ʼeʼelutolele. Au toʼabibodayavo yanoqiedi be vonigo niboana veifana ida ʼwavi ʼifoqeyea, ta ge adi fata.”
41009019	ʼInega Ieisu vonedia, “Tuta kuena omiʼa maega katoatoa ta nawale nuami ge daʼeqaʼuya, ta tolaʼai weaqina ge oda vetumaqanegu? Debami ʼiʼwanina, ʼinegana ʼwafigu siniqaiqai. Ta gwamana omiei eda ʼitei!”
41009020	ʼInega gwama~nana imiea Ieisu ʼinaya. Ta tuta~nana niboana luveifana Ieisu ʼitea, ʼinega gwama~nana vunuqia ta beʼu bwaʼobwaʼoya ʼenoʼeno buibui ta ʼawanega fulofulo ʼifoʼifoqe.
41009021	ʼInega Ieisu gwama~nana tamana vetalaʼaiea vonaya, “Totutaya yani baʼe veʼale?” ʼInega tamana vonaya, “Ena tuta goyonega.
41009022	Ta niboana luveifana tuta qabuna ʼaiwe ʼalaʼalainaya ta wese goʼilaya felafela webuiei vonigo daluluveʼaligia. Nage au fata taha yani una viaqia ta una nuakolokoloyema be una iulema?”
41009023	ʼInega Ieisu ʼoloto~nana voneaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina uvevetalaʼaiegu ʼeguma yaʼa agu fata? Ta yavona aqiaqieu, ʼeguma taha toga me ena vetumaqana e yani qabuna ana fata naviaqia.”
41009024	ʼInega ʼoloto~nana lukwayavonega vonaya, “Tawa yavetumaqana, ta nuanuagu vetumaqana~nana una giveqiduea.”
41009025	Tutana Ieisu qabu qiduana ʼitedi lukwayavonega imai sabi ʼitana tolaʼai naviaqia, e ʼinega Ieisu niboana veifana lugwaeyea vonaya, “Oʼa niboana teniqau kwavana ta nakunakuhu, yaluvineu uʼifoqe mai baʼe gwama~nana ʼinega, ta ge wese una lugu ʼevivi ʼinaya!”
41009026	ʼInega niboana luveifana kolua ta gwama~nana vunuqia beʼu bwaʼobwaʼoya dededela, ta gamonega ʼifoqe. Ta gwama~nana ana ʼita kavona toʼaliga ʼidewana. ʼInega tomotau qabudi ivonaya, “Yawaina niʼa gumwala.”
41009027	Ta Ieisu gwama~nana nimanaya kafi siveyaʼitotoya.
41009028	ʼInega Ieisu lugu vanuea, ta ana toʼabibodayavo adi ʼaidega maega itoatoa. ʼInega ivoneaya, “Tolaʼai weaqina imaʼa ge ama fata niboana~nana ada ʼwavini daʼifoqe?”
41009029	ʼInega Ieisu vona ʼeviviedi vonaya, “Baʼe niboana diavona ana fata venoqi namo ʼinega kana ʼwavinidi ina ʼifoqe.”
41009030	ʼInega Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo maega ʼabaga~nana inogea ta itauya diʼwe Galili ʼabaganavo ʼidia. Ta Ieisu ge nuanuana tomotau ina alamania toʼedia itoatoa,
41009031	mana ana toʼabibodayavo veveʼitedi. ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Nawale yaʼa Tomotau Natuna agu tosuluva naveʼineiegu tomotau ʼidia ina luveʼaligigu, ta ʼaubena toi ʼabibodanaya ʼaligega ena yaʼitoto ʼevivi.”
41009032	Ta ena vona baʼe weaqina nuadi ge dasimatala. ʼInega nuanuadi ina vetalaʼaiea vona~nana ana alamani weaqina. Ta ge ida vetalaʼaiei, mana Ieisu ena veʼia ʼidia weaqina imwaniniva.
41009033	Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo iʼifoqe ʼabaga Kafaneumi ʼinaya, ʼinega ilugu vanue gamonaya, ta Ieisu vetalaʼaiedi vonaya, “Toyani weaqina oveʼaeʼaetoga ʼedaya?”
41009034	Ta ena vetalaʼai ʼidia ge ida veʼiei, mana edi veʼaeʼaetoga ʼiuna vonigo togama ʼidiega qidua otaqina.
41009035	ʼInega Ieisu toabui ta Tuwelo~dina gaba vaʼauqidi imai ʼinaya. ʼInega vonedi vonaya, “ʼEguma taha toga oʼa nuanuau una veqidua e luaqiaqieu tauʼu una aʼuwebuieu ta tomotau weaqidi una vetofewa.”
41009036	ʼInega Ieisu taha gwama ʼebeʼewei miea ʼavalea ta vonedi vonaya,
41009037	“ʼEguma taha toga gwama baʼe ʼidewana agu wawega una ʼebeʼewea, e ʼinega ʼidewana yaʼa wese uʼebeʼewegu. Ta ʼeguma niʼa uʼebeʼewegu ʼinega wese agu Tovetune niʼa uʼebeʼewea.”
41009038	ʼInega Ioni Ieisu voneaya, “Toveʼita, ʼoloto taha aʼitea au wawega niboana luveifadi ʼwavi ʼifoqeyedi tomotau taha ʼinega. Ta ahawatayea mana tauna itaʼa ge ʼidega.”
41009039	Ta Ieisu voneaya, “Ge ona awatayei! ʼEguma taha toga viaqa ʼebenuavoqana agu wawega naviaqia, ʼinega ʼabiboda ge wese ana fata naʼawaluveifegu.
41009040	Mana ʼeguma taha toga ge davevoalaneda e tauna ada toiula.
41009041	Ta yavona aqiaqiemi, ʼeguma taha toga agu wawega goʼila naneimi mana omiʼa yaʼa Keliso egu tomotauyavo, ʼinega tauna nawale ana veʼia aqiaqina nalobea.
41009042	“Ta yavona aqiaqiemi, ʼeguma taha gwama vevetumaqanegu kavona baʼe gwama~nana, ta taha tomotau gwama~nana nasitonovia ta nagivebeʼuyea luveifana ʼinaya, e ʼinega tositonova~nana luaqiaqiea be dabo qiduana ʼebefiaqa maganaya ina yoqonia ta malavetaya ina felawebuiea ʼabo nadamana nawebui.
41009043	ʼInega ʼeguma nimau nagivebeʼuyeu luaqiaqieu be una daʼa yavulea. Mana ge taha ana luveifana ʼeguma nimau daʼadaʼana ta yawai vataya una lobea. Ta ʼesi ge daluaqiaqieu ʼeguma nimau magilafuna ta wese ma duʼu wabolau ta Yaubada nafelawebuieu ʼaiwe ʼalaʼalata vatayana ʼinaya.
41009044	-
41009045	Wese ʼidewana ʼeguma ʼaqeu nagivebeʼuyeu, luaqiaqieu be una daʼa yavulea. Mana ge taha ana luveifana ʼeguma ʼaqeu daʼadaʼana ta yawai vataya una lobea. Ta ʼesi ge daluaqiaqieu ʼeguma ʼaqeu magilafuna ta ma duʼu wabolau ta Yaubada nafelawebuieu ʼaiwe ʼalaʼalata vatayana ʼinaya.
41009046	-
41009047	Ta wese ʼeguma matau nagivebeʼuyeu una bwaqi yavulea, ge wese ana luveifana. Mana ge taha ana luveifana ʼeguma matau ʼaidegana ta Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine una lobea. Ta ʼesi ge daluaqiaqieu ʼeguma matau magilafuna ta Yaubada nafelawebuieu ʼaiwe ʼalaʼalata vatayana ʼinaya.
41009048	‘Ta ʼabaga~nana ʼinaya mwatamwata itoatoa ta wese ʼaiwe saesaela vatayana ge ena ʼweumo.’
41009049	Ta egu tovetumaqana qabudi ina vevunavunaqa ʼaiwe ʼalaʼalaina ʼinega, ʼidewana mwadeʼwa ana fata ʼabwaga ena tuta nagivekuea ta ge namaduʼwala.
41009050	Mwadeʼwa yani aqiaqina ʼabwaga weaqina, mana ana fata ʼabwaga~nana ana ʼai nagivedibidibia ta wese ana fata be ʼabwaga ena tuta nagivekuea ʼinega ge wese naʼwala. Ta ʼeguma mwadeʼwa ena waiwai nahawala be wese nagibwa, e ʼinega maʼoda kana viaqa ʼaiqa be navewaiwai ʼevivi be wese navedibidibi? Ta Yaubada nuanuana omiʼa yawaimi kavona mwadeʼwa ʼidewani, ʼinega emi toa ma emiavo navenuaʼewaʼewa, ta wese ge naluveifa. “Ta emiavo maega ona toadaumwala.”
41010001	ʼInega Ieisu Kafaneumi nogei tauya diʼwe Iudia ʼinaya ta ʼifoqe goʼila Iolidani diʼwenaya. ʼInega wese qabu qiduadi ivaʼauta imai ʼinaya. ʼInega veʼale veʼitedi ʼidewana tuta qabuna veveʼita tomotau ʼidia.
41010002	Ta Falisiavo vaina imai Ieisu ʼinaya sabi sitonovina. ʼInega ivetalaʼaiea ivonaya, “ʼEguma taha ʼoloto moqanena navesaʼilidi nage luvine nabwegei nage gebu?”
41010003	ʼInega Ieisu vona ʼeviviedi vonaya, “Maʼoda Mosese ena luvine ʼinaya vona ʼaiqa saʼila weaqina?”
41010004	ʼInega Falisiavo ivonaya, “Mosese awafela ʼeguma ʼoloto taha nuanuana moqanena navesaʼilidi, ʼinega luaqiaqiea be nugweta leta naʼwayavia ena noga weaqina, ta ʼabiboda ana fata nanogedi.”
41010005	Ta Ieisu vonedia, “ʼIdewani. Ta yavona aqiaqiemi, Mosese baʼe luvine~nana ʼwayavia omiʼa emi vedeba ʼiʼwana weaqina.
41010006	“Ta ona nuaia tuta ʼebeveʼale ʼinaya Yaubada tomotau magilafudi viaqidi meʼolotona be wese mevavinena.
41010007	ʼInegana ʼoloto tamana be inana nanogedi ta moqanena maega ina veʼaidega.
41010008	Ta magilafudi ʼwafidi naveʼaidega, mana lova magilafudi itoa dumaduma, ta ʼitagana niʼa iveʼaidega.
41010009	ʼInegana tolaʼai Yaubada niʼa luvetubedi ge taha toga navetoasiʼiedi!”
41010010	ʼAbiboda Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo maega iʼevivi imai vanuea. Ta ʼinega wese Ieisu ivetalaʼaiea saʼila weaqina.
41010011	ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “ʼEguma taha ʼoloto moqanena navesaʼilidi ta navaqi ukamana mali vavine ʼidia, e ʼinega ʼoloto~nana ena ilivu ʼinega luabu ilivuna niʼa viaqia moqanena nugwenugweidi ʼidia, mana edi vaqi bwegea.
41010012	Ta wese ʼidewana ʼeguma vavine taha moqanedi ina saʼilea ta ina vaqi ukamana taha ʼoloto ʼinaya, e ʼinega taudi wese luabu ilivuna tawa iviaqia.”
41010013	Tomotau gogama goyogoyodi imiedi Ieisu ʼinaya nuanuadi nagitonovidi. Ta ana toʼabibodayavo tomotau diavona iawatayedi.
41010014	Tutana Ieisu awataya~nana noqolia, ʼinega nuana luveifa ta lugwaeyedi vonaya, “Gogama ge ona awatayedi ta ʼesi ona awafeledi ina mai ʼiguya, mana Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine taudi weaqidi.
41010015	Yavona aqiaqiemi, ʼeguma taha toga Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine ge naʼawahaqiaqiei kavona gogama ʼebeluvine~nana iʼawahaqiaqiea, e ʼinega tomotau~nana ge wese ana fata be nalugu ʼinaya.”
41010016	ʼInega Ieisu gogama ʼesilagaidi ta nimanega gitonovidi be vona veyolubedi.
41010017	ʼInega Ieisu tutuvila tauya, ta tauya~nana ʼinaya taha ʼoloto vihila mai ʼinaya tuqatuqanega sobadi ta voneaya, “Toveʼita aqiaqiu, tolaʼai ena viaqi be ʼinega yawaigu vataya ena lobei?”
41010018	Ta Ieisu voneaya, “Maʼoda ʼinega uʼawahaqiaqiegu, mana ge taha toga aqiaqina ta ʼesi Yaubada ana ʼaidegamo.
41010019	Ta oʼa Yaubada ena luvineavo niʼa ualamanidi, Ge una luveʼaliga. Ge una luabu. Ge una vanawala. Ge uʼavega tomotau una ʼawaluveifedi. Ge uʼavega tomotau edi kulufa una ʼewedi. Ta wese tamau be inau una ʼamayabedi.”
41010020	ʼInega ʼolotona vonaya, “Toveʼita, egu tuta gwamaʼunu ʼinega baʼe luvine diavona qabudi yaʼabiboda aqiaqiedi.”
41010021	ʼInega Ieisu ʼoloto~nana ʼita makimakia ta voneaya, “Iagu yaveyolubeu, ta yani ʼaideganamo ʼinega uvaʼwaqi. ʼInega una ʼevivi eu ʼabagaya ta eu kulufa qabudi una vegimwaneyedi be adi veʼia una ʼewei una vewilaʼayedi lukwalukwa ʼidia, ta ʼinega una mai una ʼabibodegu. ʼInega eu kaikaiwabu mahalaya una lobea.”
41010022	Ieisu ena vona baʼe ʼoloto~nana noqolia, ʼinega me ena nuavita ʼevivi tauya, mana ena kaikaiwabu vegagalea.
41010023	ʼInega Ieisu ʼitagivila ta ana toʼabibodayavo vonedi vonaya, “Tomeqabu me edi kaikaiwabu edi lugu Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine ʼinaya vitana.”
41010024	Ta Ieisu ena vona baʼe weaqina ana toʼabibodayavo nuadi voqana. ʼInega Ieisu wese vonaya, “Natugwavo, Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine ana lugu vitana.
41010025	ʼInega ʼebevetalatutula baʼe ona noqolia: Yubai kameli ena lugu saima vetoana ʼinega vitana, ta taudi kaikaiwabudi edi lugu Yaubada ena ʼEbeluvine ʼinaya vita otaqina.”
41010026	ʼInega wese toʼabiboda~dina nuadi voqana qiduana Ieisu ena vona weaqina ta ivonaya, “ʼInega togama ana fata ʼetoyavua vataya nalobei?”
41010027	Ta Ieisu ʼitedi vonedia, “Tomotau taudiega ge adi fata. Ta Yaubada ʼinaya yani qabuna ana fata.”
41010028	ʼInega Fita voneaya, “Kaiwabu, imaʼa maʼoda, mana ema kulufayavo qabudi niʼa anogedi ta aʼabiʼabibodeu?”
41010029	Ta Ieisu vonedia, “Yavona aqiaqiemi, ʼeguma tomeqabu edi vanueavo nage taidiavo be, novudiavo be, inadiavo be, tamadiavo be, natudiavo, ta wese edi vaoqayavo niʼa inogedi Valegu aqiaqina ana simana weaqina,
41010030	e ʼinega adi veʼia ma ana luvetomana ʼidewani edi vanueavo be, taidiavo be, novudiavo be, inadiavo be, natudiavo be wese edi vaoqayavo 100 ʼidewani ina lobea. Ta baʼe yani diavona ina lobedi vaina vita maega, ʼinega tuta maimai ʼinaya yawai vataya ina ʼewea.
41010031	Ta tomeqabu baʼitaga inugwenugweta nawale ina ʼabiboda, ta tomeqabu baʼitaga iʼabiʼabiboda nawale ina nugweta.”
41010032	Nawale ʼedaya itautauya sabi ʼwatovu Ielusalema ʼinaya, ta Ieisu ana toʼabibodayavo ʼabibodanega itautauya me edi nuavoqana, mana lova Ieisu ena vona ʼidia weaqina inuanua. Ta wese vaina tomotau me edi mwaniniva ʼedaya iʼabiʼabibodedi. ʼInega Ieisu Tuwelo~dina gaba vaʼauqidi imai ta ʼewedi ivanaqo ʼeda tufinaya sabi vematamagilafuyedi tolaʼai nawale naʼifoqe ʼinaya.
41010033	ʼInega vonedi vonaya, “Kaʼwatoʼwatovu Ielusalema ʼinaya, ta omoʼe ʼinaya yaʼa Tomotau Natuna agu tosuluva nasuluvegu toveguba qiduqiduadi be luvine ana toveʼitayavo ʼidia. Ta taudimo ina dima govaqa egu ʼaliga weaqina, be ʼabiboda ina veʼineiegu taudi ge me Diu ʼidia.
41010034	Ta ina givenuʼwegu be ina gidaʼwegu ta wese wayo metametanega ina vunuqa dadanegu, ʼinega ina luveʼaligigu. Ta ʼaubena toi ʼabibodanaya ena yaʼitoto ʼevivi.”
41010035	ʼInega Iemesa be Ioni, taudi Sebedi natunavo, imai Ieisu ʼinaya ivoneaya, “Toveʼita, anoqinoqieu taha yani una viaqia weaqima.”
41010036	Ta Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Tolaʼai nuanuami ena viaqi ʼimia?”
41010037	Ta ivoneaya, “Oʼa tuta nana una toatoa eu ʼEbeluvine aqiaqi otaqina gamonaya ʼinega nuanuama imaʼa una awafelema be diʼweuya ana toabui, taha au ʼataqia ta taha au kelia.”
41010038	ʼInega Ieisu vona ʼeviviedi vonaya, “Omiʼa emi noqi baʼe ana alamani ge oda alamania. Nawale visiqa vedina ʼinega ena numa, nage omiʼa wese ami fata vedi~nana ʼinega ona numa? Ta wese visiqa ana babitaiso ʼinega ena babitaiso, nage omiʼa wese ami fata ʼidewani ona babitaiso ʼaiqa?”
41010039	Ta ivonaya, “Ama fata!” ʼInega Ieisu vonedi vonaya, “Vonahaqiaqi, vedi~nana ʼinega ena numa omiʼa wese ʼinega ona numa. Ta wese babitaiso~nana ʼinega ena babitaiso omiʼa wese ona babitaiso.
41010040	Ta ge agu fata baʼitaga ena venuaʼivina tomeqabu nawale agu ʼataqia be wese agu kelia ina toabui, gebuʼe! Mana lova Yaubada ena tomotauyavo niʼa venuaʼivinedi ʼinega edi ʼebetoa niʼa ʼivaʼavaʼaia.”
41010041	ʼInega toʼabibodayavo teni Iemesa be Ioni edi noqi inoqolia ta diadi vilea ʼidia.
41010042	ʼInega Ieisu toʼabiboda~dina gaba vaʼauqidi imai vonedi vonaya, “Niʼa oalamania bwaʼobwaʼo ana toluvineavo taudiega adi wawa igivaneyea, ta luvine falafalana edi tomotauyavo ineineidi.
41010043	Ta omiʼa ge wese ʼidewana ona viaqa ʼaiqa. Ta ʼesi ʼeguma taha toga ʼimiega nuanuau una veqidua eu qabu gamonaya, e luaqiaqieu be nugweta emwavo qabudi una vetofewa weaqidi.
41010044	Ta wese ʼeguma togama ʼimiega nuanuau una vetovanugweta e luaqiaqieu tomotau qabudi weaqidi una vetofewa.
41010045	Mana yaʼa Tomotau Natuna wese ʼidewana yamai bwaʼobwaʼoya gebu tomotau weaqigu ina vetofewa, ta ʼesi yaʼa tomotau ena vetofewa ʼidia. Ta wese yawaigu yagubaufayea emi luveifana weaqina sabi ʼetoyavuimi.”
41010046	ʼInega Ieisu ma ana toʼabibodayavo imai ʼabaga Ieliko ʼinaya ilugu. Ta ʼabiboda ʼabaga~nana inogea ta qabu qiduana maega itauya. ʼInega taha ʼoloto tomatakwaya ana wawa Batimio, tauna Timio natuna, ʼeda nanavinaya toatoa. Ta tauna tuta qabuna vevenoqi mane be wese kulufa weaqidi.
41010047	Ta tuta~nana noqolia Ieisu Nasaleta ʼolotona ʼifoqe maimai ʼinega gaba vonaya, “Ieisu ye, oʼa Deibida natuna, uda nuakolokoloyegu!”
41010048	Tomotau qabudi Batimio iawatayea ivoneaya, “ʼAia, uluaʼu!” Ta tua wese bonana qiduanega gaba vonaya, “Deibida natuna ye, uda nuakolokoloyegu!”
41010049	ʼInega Ieisu veutovolo ta vonaya, “Ogabei mai!” ʼInega tomotau matakwaya~nana igabea ivoneaya, “Me eu qaiawa una yaʼitoto mana Ieisu gabegabeu.”
41010050	ʼInega ana kwakwalufai vataʼia yavulei, ta lukwayavonega yaʼitoto mai Ieisu ʼinaya.
41010051	ʼInega Ieisu vetalaʼaiea vonaya, “Nage tolaʼai nuanuau ena viaqi ʼiuya?” ʼInega matakwaya~nana vonaya, “Toveʼita, nuanuagu matagu una giveaqiaqiedi be yaqisa agu fata ena ʼita.”
